128b4(dkon brtsegs): pasbyong bar mdzad kyang 'di la cung zad kyang ston pa med de ston par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med do// kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo 'di ni ye shes tshad med pa yang dag par
128b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas bya nga chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa skyes la sems can dpag
128b6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la sems dang po bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
128b7(dkon brtsegs): chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni bskal pa grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing spobs pa
128b8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa nyid la yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ 'od zer
129a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag bkye ste/ 'od zer des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
129a2(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi le'u 'di thob par gyur to// thob nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par gyur
129a3(dkon brtsegs): to// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i tshe sems can thams
129a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char yang bab par gyur to// 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang 'di
129a5(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yeng na/ sa thob par gyur cig ces tshig tu smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mtha' yas kyis
129a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa
129a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas gzungs kyi rgyal po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ spobs pa tshad med pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 
129a8(dkon brtsegs): sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ spobs pa mtha' yas 'di ni don thams cad yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo yin te/ des na
129b1(dkon brtsegs): chas thams cad snang bar 'gyu lo chos kyi sgo don byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma tsam thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba yin / 'don pa'i rjes su nan pa mam/ danas/ 
129b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das la me tog kha dog lnga pas mngon par gtor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub
129b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dpa'adi dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dedang / lA dang / dri ba dang / mi dang / lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sams te/ com ldan 'as
129b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsungs pa la mngon par nga / dgas pa go mchog chags chen pa chos kyi rnamaklas du maung drug brgya la/ 
129b5(dkon brtsegs): sgomatha' yas pa rnam par stong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba 'i ladu/ ste/ she log stong nyis brgyaste// bam po da
129b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya ta thA ga tA a tsan tu gu h+ya ni de sha nA ma ma hA yAn su tra bod skad du
129b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
129b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di na bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i baban bya nod kyi phung po'i ram dge slong bo ni khri nyis stong
130a1(dkon brtsegs): gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa phal cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing
130a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bzod pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 
130a3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa'i
130a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa phas kyi rgol ba tham das cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom pa sems can thams cad kyi sems
130a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bsam pa dang spyod pa'i sgrub pa shes pa dbang po mchogadang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par rab tu
130a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur la rab tu bsngags pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
130a7(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par byang chub kyi lam mtha' yas pa mthar gtugs pa/ sems dang / sadang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa/ namakha' ltar mtha'o yas par
130a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la btsun pa/ chags pa'i gnas slong pa dang / chong pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthu che'i lus thob pa rdo rje ltar
130b1(dkon brtsegs): sku zhing ma nubs pa'i lus dang ldanub / seng ge'i sgrachen po stogs pa 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pal 'jigs pa med par mkhas pa zla ba dang nyim mos chog por
130b2(dkon brtsegs): byeng pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa ye shes kyis ston pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
130b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pas rtag pa dang chang par lta ba'i mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang
130b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pa dang / ldang bar shes pa lam khas pa phyogs bcur sgra grags pa/ dam pa chos dkon mchog gi mdzad yang dag par 'dzin pa/ 
130b5(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chang bar byed pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu medapa bsags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'
130b6(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i tog dang / ri bong can gyi tog dang 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / dpal brtsegs dang / dpal spos dang
130b7(dkon brtsegs): mthub tshingang / klu dag dang klu'i bla ma dang / klus byin dang / gzugs 'dzin dang / mya ngan gyi lnga dang / yon tan ldan ma'i rgyal ba dang / lagan ldan ma dang / 
130b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lag 'dag / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / lag ni phyag rgya rin po che dang / lag na rin po che dang / kun tu snang dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na rdoH/ 
131a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros chen po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten
131a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang blo gros mtha' yas dang blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / nor gyi blo gros dang
131a3(dkon brtsegs): bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / rtag tu mos pa dang / rtag tu bgod cing rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dang / ngan song spong ba dang / sgrib
131a4(dkon brtsegs): pathams cad rnam par sel ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'chang ba dang / brtson 'grus 'bar dang / shes rab brtsegs dang
131a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / lhun po brtsegs dang na mkha' mdzod dang / mi 'dzums pa dang / brjod
131a6(dkon brtsegs): med dang / rin chen ngom pa dang rin chen sems pa dang legs par sems pa dang / don legs par rnam par bsams pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i blo gros dang
131a7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / zhing yang dag par brgyan pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / phug sbas dang / 
131a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / tshangs pa dra ba can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lag bzangs dang / mig
131b1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang / seng ge'i tog dang / don 'grub blo gros dang / kha lo bsgyur dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byams/ 
131b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
131b3(dkon brtsegs): ma brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za'i
131b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ na mkha' da lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa
131b5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur ba la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / chu lha dang / 
131b6(dkon brtsegs): gzican dang / 'jog po dang gser mdag dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang klu'i rgyal po mtshon bzangs dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po 'kho
131b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa brgya stong phrag mang po bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/ 
131b8(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang thag bzangs ris dang / lag bzangs dang sa la dang ta la dang / bde mchog dang / rab sim dang / tshe rab dang / 
132a1(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dngas gnod sbyin gzhan dang de dag dang gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / 
132a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes bgra yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
132a3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gnyen dang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor
132a4(dkon brtsegs): de nyid 'dus par gyur to// de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang bcom ldan
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// sa bla na spyod
132a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya
132a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing
132a8(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i bsgo bsdu ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di lta ste/ 
132b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su
132b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
132b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro// / 
132b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon dmongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa
132b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
132b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
132b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
132b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyis kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni
133a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba slong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib paspong bar 'gyur ro// 
133a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs ni
133a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i las chud mi za bar 'gyur ro// dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs
133a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag dpa'i tshogs ni lus dang / tshor ba dang sems dang da chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong / 
133a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems
133a6(dkon brtsegs): yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// 
133a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 
133a8(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshogs ni mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par 'gyur ro// ston pa'i tshegs ni
133b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la rag ma las pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad
133b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i tshogs ni ci rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chug par 'gyur ro// nang du
133b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni ji skad thos pa'i chos chud mi gson par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos
133b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par 'gyur ro// bsngo ba la mkhas dpa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyuraro// 
133b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i cho ga sa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzog sa par 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
133b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad do// tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba bstan pa
133b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
133b8(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bgyi ba'i
134a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag
134a2(dkon brtsegs): gis 'tshal ba ltar na bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang yas kyi tshas/ 
134a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni rnam par
134a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub bo// ye shes kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad legs par bshadadapas tshim par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na
134a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson pa ra bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
134a6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ye shes kyi tshogs kyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol
134a7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis ni lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni bdud
134a8(dkon brtsegs): sdig can gyis thul bar dka'o// bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 
134b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad ston te mi 'chab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros
134b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring ba nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/ gsang ba ba'i
134b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can tha ma lta smos kyang ci dgos pa
134b4(dkon brtsegs): las rtsoms te khyod spobs par gyis shig / de skad ces smras pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// 
134b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
134b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par
134b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i
134b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes spro bar mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
135a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de/ khyod langs
135a2(dkon brtsegs): bskul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la rtsoms te/ 'khor 'dir spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcoM
135a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / 
135a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gseng ba rnams la gang cung zad 'a 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan pa dar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin
135a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mar me'i mthus gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gda' ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / 
135a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam bstan par bgyi'o// 
135a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ni rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i
135a8(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams thos nas mi sdang mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor legs par 'khod cig/ de nas byang chub sems
135b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te/ dAn/ 
135b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab po dang / sangs rgyas bsam gyis/ 
135b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'o// yang grogs po dag gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bani rnam par bkod pa
135b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin gshegs dpa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so// dgrogs po dag de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
135b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bas ma gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi sdang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// thos nas lhag par
135b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo dang / dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher bskyed par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ ci ltar thams cad dang ldan
135b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan pa la mos por gyur cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyis
135b8(dkon brtsegs): brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// 
136a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o// zhi ba'i zla
136a2(dkon brtsegs): gros gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
136a3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho na byang chub sems dpa'i zha 'bring na 'dug 'dug na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'gyur ba 'am/ lus tshul 'chos pa kho bos nam yang ma mthong / 
136a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'gyur ba 'am/ ngag gi kha gsag kyang ma thos/ sems 'gyur ba 'am/ sems g.yo ba yang ma mtho dang ngo // de lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs
136a5(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed de/ tshig tu ni mi smra'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i lus kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mu med par snang ste/ zhi ba'i
136a6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa med par gnas so// 'di lta ste
136a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bsam gtan gyi spyod lam ston to// rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu dbyangs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i
136a8(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis spyod lam dang / khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khye'u'i spyod lam dang / bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang / bud med kyis
136b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bud med kyi spyod lam dang / skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod lam dang / gzhon nus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la
136b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nu'i sgyed lam dang bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar ma'i spyod lam dang / rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang yan lag
136b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i spyod lam dang / gdol pa rkang lag chad pas gdul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad
136b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod lam dang / lkugs pa dang 'phye bos gang dal ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dang / 'phye bo'i spyod lam dang / long ba dang / 'on pa
136b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ long ba dang / 'on pa'i spyod lam dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ 
136b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dud 'gro'i
136b7(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i spyod lam dang / lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ lha'i spyod lam dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
136b8(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ klu dang gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
137a1(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang / brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya
137a2(dkon brtsegs): byin gyi spyod lam dang / tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can lnga tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang / 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang / 
137a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i spyod lam dang / dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dge slong gi spyod lam dang / 
137a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang dge bsnyen gyi 'dul pa'i sems can rnams la/ dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang / 
137a5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dge ba snyen ma'i spyod lom dang / nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'isems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi spyod lam
137a6(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems
137a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gzugs med pa ni ma gtogs so// 
137a8(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam
137b1(dkon brtsegs): yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam ston mod kyi lus kyi chos
137b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// lus kyis lus kyi las byed mod kyi/ lus kyi dben pa yang mi 'dor ro// de lus yongs su dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
137b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bde bar byed do// lus la mi lta bas sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gis lus las de dag la bltab nas bdag
137b4(dkon brtsegs): srog dang phral te/ sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do// khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do// / rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do// gzi byin zab
137b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed do// zhi bo'i blo gros de ltar sha'i longs spyod ci snyed par de dag thams cad bdag gi lus las bstabs te/ srog dang phral nas sems
137b6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag la sbyin por byed do// de'i lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do// de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi
137b7(dkon brtsegs): zad pa mngon por sgrubs pas rab tu rig par 'gyur ro// de lus kyi sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed de/ gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin
137b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ston te/ de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas byugs shing kun tu byugs te/ 
138a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag pang du 'jog go// de dag skyes bu de dag gi bang du son pa dang / rnyis shing skams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do// mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par
138a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ skyes bu de dag des yid byung nas bor te/ song ba dang shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
138a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu 'byung ngo // yang zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te/ sor mo'i rtse mos
138a4(dkon brtsegs): yungs 'bru la bya ba de bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khebs nga par byed do// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me la lag pa'i sor mos g.yogs kyang de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro// 
138a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod/ cing rim gro byed de me tog gi gdugs ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
138a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi sgron bu dag kyang 'thor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru
138a7(dkon brtsegs): mar gyis gang ba'i snod gcig tu mos te/ ri rab tsam gyi snying po 'bar bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
138a8(dkon brtsegs): snye kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus kyang ras bcos pus bkris nas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te/ mar mor 'dud
138b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems can dag gis kyang mthong zhing shes te byang chub sems dpa'i khyu
138b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gyur pa de mthong nas kyang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa da
138b3(dkon brtsegs): dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la yang bdag gis ga/ zugs mtshan po che chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / log na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te/ der sems
138b4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrag nas byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tsha'o// de la chos kyang nyan par 'dod do// gang yang grong khyer
138b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa der yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus
138b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par ston to// der yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ci tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar phyin te/ 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing
138b7(dkon brtsegs): shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o// de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du rgyur 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi
138b8(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag 'tsho ba'i dus su gyur nas/ shi ba'i lus la sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris su skye ba nas/ yongs su
139a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig/ ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa 'grub 'dod pa grub
139a2(dkon brtsegs): smon pa grub po zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis ci ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
139a3(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa na mkhas bskor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste/ de na grong dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po
139a4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de/ da zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na nang chen po'i nga bskal ba bar ma byung ste/ der sems can dag nang sna
139a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas/ phal cher lus shu ba can dang / lus rnam pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpal dang / thor bu dang / 
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to// de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson par gyur kyang
139a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi nad de bsal bar ma nus so// der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i dpyad ma rnyed de skyabs med nas 'di skad du/ nad 'di las ni thar byed pa// lha 'am
139a8(dkon brtsegs): klu'am dri za'am// gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung // mi ma yin pa su zhig yod// sdug bsngal 'di las thar byed pa// de la nor rnams thams cad btang // rjes su bstan
139b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du bya// byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya// zhes khu tsho cher 'don to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lha'i
139b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs shes bya bar gyur te/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa yang mthong
139b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas khu tsho chen po 'don pa'i sgra yang thos so// des de dag mthong zhing thos nas kyang / snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ci
139b4(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gis gnas su 'gyuradaper bya'o// skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams
139b5(dkon brtsegs): nas des de ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu srog chags nges pa zhes bya bar rdzus
139b6(dkon brtsegs): te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskul pa/ ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na srog chags nges pa zhes bya yod/ 
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi sha la sus zos pa// de ni nad las thar par 'gyur// 'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par// ji ltar 'dod par de yi sha long shig/ de la khro med gshe med gnod
139b8(dkon brtsegs): sems med// 'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji/ 
140a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed yod pa de dag gi sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
140a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smraso// bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob
140a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba// bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha/ 'dir ni nams kyang zad par ma gyur cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar phyogs bzhi'i
140a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis srog chags kyi rnam dpa nges pa'i lus la sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / dede'i lus la bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ 
140a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bcad yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams
140a6(dkon brtsegs): cad zhi bar gyur te/ nad mod cing bde ba dang / nyams pa med par gyur to// de nas mthar gyi 'dzam+bu gling gi sems can gyi nad thams cad bsal bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros
140a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'dzam bu gling gi skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag 'di snyam du sems te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar
140a8(dkon brtsegs): cing nad med par byas te/ bde zhing nyams pa med par byas kyis/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas shig bya'o snyam nas de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chag
140b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs// khyod ni bdag cag sman pa
140b2(dkon brtsegs): sman khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba// khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol cig/ de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag gi brgya byin gyi lus su
140b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshig su bcad pas smras pa// nga la nor dang zas skom dang // gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med// thams cad lhan cig 'thun par ni/ 
140b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu'i las lam bsrungs// sems can kun la phan dpa'i phyir/ byang chub smon lam brtan pa thib/ phan pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems// gcig la gcig
140b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byams pa bskyed// brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos// sems can de dag rab dga' ste/ shin tu yo/ ngasu dag pa yi// dge ba bcu'i las lam blangs/ 
140b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de tshun chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo de snyed las tha na sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song
140b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mi dran no// de tshun chad de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang / bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par
140b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ de dag yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod nas/ de la
141a1(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha gcig ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
141a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas na
141a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so// gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gan dos / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i
141a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mi shigs pa sra ba brtan pa 'chi 'pho med pa brdzus te skye ba ste/ lus de ni 'jigs pas 'dul ba'i sems can
141a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir 'jig go// lus mi' jigs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir thams cad kyi thams cad du mi
141a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig ste/ mes mi tshig mtshon gyis mi tshugs shing dngos po rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan te mi shigs pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems can yongasu
141a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi sems mi rtog ste/ lus la lus kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so// lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa
141a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid shes so// lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyis su mi byed de/ lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa
141b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rje su 'jug go// de rang gis lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi
141b2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par byed do// de rang gis lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyis lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi
141b3(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i mtshan nyid du shes so// chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rje su 'thob bo// 
141b4(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus da kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin
141b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid shes so// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// chos tha/ mas cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de
141b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid shes so// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang
141b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
141b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid do// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do// kun nas nyon mongs
142a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
142a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yino// / 
142a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang / de lta bu nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / mi 'byung ba nyid dang / rtsod pa
142a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de gzugs/ med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin
142a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang gzug sa med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de bzhin nyid gzug
142a6(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed do// de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ston to/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de
142a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i skul rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gis lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go// lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas lus thams cad ni
142a8(dkon brtsegs): lus med par yang dag par mthong ngo // lus thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rab tu shes so// shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrub bo// de chos kyi sku mngon par
142b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pas chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te/ phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no// de chos kyi sgras rab tu phye bas na mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// 
142b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'ong lta ste dper na sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus te/ rtsi'i shing mang po las
142b3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa baulta na sdug pa legs par byas te/ legs par zin cing legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ 
142b4(dkon brtsegs): nyal yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// der na dad pa gang btsun pa btsun pa rgyal po 'am/ rgyal dpo'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu'am/ tshong dpon
142b5(dkon brtsegs): nam/ khyim bdag gam blon po 'am/ rgyal phran pa/ nga dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad nas de dag phrad ma thag tu/ 
142b6(dkon brtsegs): nad thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde la nyams pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gang sman pa gzhan la med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba'i shes pa la ltos/ 
142b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yang sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
142b8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis lus la reg na reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lus yongs su gdung ba dang bral bar
143a1(dkon brtsegs): yang shes so// de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros kyi skus rab tu phye
143a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin kham
143a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de zas thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o// de zas za'ang mid pa ma yin za'ang
143a4(dkon brtsegs): khong du 'jug par mi byed do// chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis/ mi nyams yongasu mi nyams so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang 'chi
143a5(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba med kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba yang ston to// de 'chi'i 'pho yang chos thams cad
143a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu shes so// 'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// skye yang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu
143a7(dkon brtsegs): shes so// de chos kyi sku dang ldan chos kyi zas dang ldan/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing chos la rton pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo
143a8(dkon brtsegs): gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i sku/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad
143b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku// dpa' med pa 'dra ba med pa dag pa dri ma med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku/ 
143b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel pa'i sku/ sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang / chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
143b3(dkon brtsegs): dang smon pa med pa la nges par btags pa'i sku phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i namakha'i khyab pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sku mtha' yas mu med pa'i sku
143b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku mi gso zhing rlom sems meng po'i sku/ gnas pa dang / dmi gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku/ gzugs
143b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku/ tshor ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/ sa'i khams kyis rab
143b6(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/ chu'i khams kyis ma yin/ mo'i khams kyis ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ ma byung ba kun nas ma byung ba'o// 'byung
143b7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'o// 'byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// mig las ma byung ba'o// 
143b8(dkon brtsegs): rna ba la mi gnas pa'o// snas shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// lces rab tu ma phye ba'o// lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o// yid kyis nye bar sprad pa ma yin pa'o// sems
144a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'jug pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug pa mi ldog rje su mi 'jug pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sma ni de 'dra'o// da mas/ 
144a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa la spyod cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling na
144a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang rung / 'dzam bu'i gling yang rung grong dang / grong khyor dang / grong brda la dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor ji skad yod pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'
144a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar yang byed la/ bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de mthong bar yang byed la mthong bar snang ba yang med do// mthong bar mi byed pas
144a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang mthong bar snang ngo // mthong ba dang thos pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba yang ma yin no// sems can yongs su smin par bya bas rab tu phye ba yin yang / 
144a6(dkon brtsegs): lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongs su mi nyams so// de lus mi rtag pa dang / lus sdug bsngal ba dang / lus bdag med par yang sems
144a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la ston la/ lus kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de lus rab tu dbye ba yang sems can rnams la ston la/ rgyu gang dang dmigs pa gang dag gis lus
144a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa po med pa dang / tsher ba po med par yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // lus rtsa dang / shing dang / 
144b1(dkon brtsegs): cig bdud lam dang rig sor lta bur yang rab tu shes shing de lus kyi las yongs su dag par yang sems can rnams la ston te ni ba'i bla gros 'drin bzhin gshegs/ 
144b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mar me mdzad tshun chad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
144b3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par bstan to// gzhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba
144b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab
144b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// 'das pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bam po gnyis pagazhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub
144b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 
144b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs ji snyed par sgra la/ 'jug pa'ang de snyed do// 
144b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi sgra brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda' dang / smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / mtshan ma dang / 
145a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sbrul 'jug pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ 
145a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ tha na srin bu dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang ma dang / phye ma leb kyi sgra dag la'ang ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta
145a3(dkon brtsegs): bus sems can de dag gi lus shin du sbyangs pa dang / sems shin du sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrag pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo // 
145a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// // ji ltar sems can tha ma gang yang med// de ltar skyes pa'i rabs te dpag tu med// skal pa brgya
145a5(dkon brtsegs): snyed bshad kyang mtha' ma med// bsam yas de dag ji ltar/ bshad par bya// skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che/ ba'i tshig/ sems dang bsam pa rgya cher rab ston pa// 
145a6(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' lta bur gang med bri med pa// 'on kyang dpe' don ldan par bshad par bya// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / brgya byin gyi sgra skad
145a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'byin pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
145a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin po dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o// de la
145b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ma smad tshig/ gang ba med cing bri med nam mkha' bzhin// sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag/ de dag brjod pa rnams la nan/ 
145b2(dkon brtsegs): tan nyon// byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang // dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de// tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung bas// legs bshad des ni tshangs pa tshim
145b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// gang dag brgya byin rol mo yi 'ong sgra// de dag de yi sgra brjod zil gyis non// rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni// chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung // mi'am ci'i
145b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dag gang yod pa// de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshe gas// de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de/ de yi tshig gis mo ci dga' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i khams
145b5(dkon brtsegs): na yid 'ong sgra yod pa// rol mo'i sgra dang lha yi sgra mang po// chos kyi don 'byor dge bar ldan pa yi// de yi tshig gis kun du tshim par byed// mi yi 'dren pa yini tshig
145b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas// 'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi// gti mug g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi// don rnams gtan la phebs shing the tshom med// gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang
145b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa// de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed// mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur zhes byang chub tshol// klu dbang dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyi// rol
145b8(dkon brtsegs): ma sna tshogs sgra yang de dag pas// yon ton rgyamatsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa// thams cad rab tu dag rab rgya chen byed// 'jam gling 'din tha dad phyogs rnams su// kun nas
146a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi// de yi skad kyi rnam par bsgrags gyur na// de thos mi rnams thar pa rjes su thog/ sa bla'i lha dang de bzhin par snang lnga// 
146a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug/ rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o// ngang pa khrung khrung ka la bing ka dang // rma ba ne tse khu byug shang shang te'u// 
146a3(dkon brtsegs): ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun// ji lta'i skad kyis nges ni tshim par byed// stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spre'u// gzig dang byi la ri dgas gling chen bas// rta dang khyi dang phag dang
146a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ug pa kun// ji lho'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed// / gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang // rkang mangs dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams// bskul dang chad pas bca/ 
146a5(dkon brtsegs): phan gdags phyir// kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug// sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na// rab bam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma 'am// dmyal ba dud 'gro
146a6(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten na// lha mi rnams dang da ni skad kyang 'thun// ji ltar rigs par byed pa sten kyang ni// mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med// mtshan ma med cing 'dzin med
146a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba med// mnyam par gzhag pas sems ni 'khrug pa med// dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na yang // de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni// bye ba'i zhing dang de yi
146a8(dkon brtsegs): gong du yang // gang+gA'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed// stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa// de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra thos nas// chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor
146b1(dkon brtsegs): du'athal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed// sems can gang dag rab tu smra 'dod dang // nga rgyal zil gnon su la'ang mi 'dud pa// de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas// thal mo sbyar te
146b2(dkon brtsegs): gus par 'dud par byed// 'on pa glen pa dag dang lce med dang // rig pa rnams dang gang dag skad mdzed pa// de dag de yis legs smras snyan thos dang // sgra skad yid 'ong ba 'byin par byed// 
146b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir ba dang // nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis bkris pa rnams// de dag de yis dge tshig dag zos nas// 'gyod pa brtul bar gyur cing bsol bar 'gyur/ 
146b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra// mi rtag sgra thos de nas ni sems can rnams// sbyin dang thos dang tshul khri/ dmas bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom par byed// sangs rgyas dbyings dang bar med gang ga zhes pa// mtha' yas dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes can// de dag rnams kyi yan tan thams cad ni/ 
146b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye mang bzod kyang zad mi nus// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ngag chags pa'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa'am/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ thogs pa'am/ nye bar
146b7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa 'am/ dman pa 'am/ rab tu dman pa'am/ brlang ba 'am/ zher 'debs pa 'am/ mi rdzogs pa'am/ rtsub pa'am/ rjesu chags pa 'am/ khong khro ba 'am/ 
146b8(dkon brtsegs): byung rgyal 'am/ bag la nyal ba 'am/ 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs bag la nyal ba 'am/ mi brtan pa 'am/ gtsam pa 'am/ khengs pa 'am/ 
147a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gying pa 'am/ myur ba'am/ dus ma yin par smra ba 'am/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ sdug pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par
147a2(dkon brtsegs): che ba 'am/ shin tu chags pa 'am/ rab tu lhod pa 'am/ rab tu spangs pa 'am/ rab tu dal ba 'am/ dbang po nyams pa'am/ gdangs nyams pa'am/ sems nyams pa'am/ 
147a3(dkon brtsegs): yo ba'am/ dman pa 'am/ mi gsal ba 'am/ skad su ba sub po 'am/ ngor byas te smra ba 'am/ 'gal bar smra ba'am/ glags pa 'am/ 'byung ba ma yin pa 'am/ gshe
147a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ bdag dang pha rol gdung bar byed pa 'am/ tshig blang ba/ ra 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshig bzung bar 'os pa ma yin
147a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ tshig dang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa'am/ 'byor pa'i tshig ma yin pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin/ 
147a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gam gzhogs 'drid zer ba 'am/ chos dang mi ldan pa 'am/ 'gal ba 'am/ gnod pa 'am/ dus las yol ba 'am/ tshod las 'da' ba 'am/ lung bstan pa la thogs
147a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang ldan pa 'am/ rnyed pas rnyed par 'dod pa'i tshig gam/ 'byung ba'i ma yin pa'i ston pa 'am/ mig 'khrul par 'gyur ba 'am/ 
147a8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ som nyi'i tshig gam/ sdug par byed pa'i tshig gam/ mi sdug cing gnang du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gam/ rang gi phyogs
147b1(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa'i tshig gam gzhan gyi phyogs tshar gcad pa'i tshig gam/ bdag bstod pa la rjes su chags pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi bstod pa la bar du gcod pa'i tshig smra ba 'am/ 
147b2(dkon brtsegs): thing slad dam/ gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig gam/ gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ gsang rtol ba'i tshig gam/ ngag bsrangs pa ma yin pa'i
147b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ mkhas pas spyad pa'i tshig gam/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ brlang 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ ngor mngon du bstod pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyis
147b4(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa dus ma yin par gleng ba'i tshig gam/ zug rngus deganang du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa kun brjod pa'i tshig gam/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus
147b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa'i tshig gam/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brda spyod pa'i tshig gam/ las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa'i tshig mi 'byin to// 
147b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa
147b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no// gal te de shing drung na 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ 'dug gam/ nyal kyang rung / la la zhig 'ongs nas kye skyes bu shing ljon
147b8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed cig yod ces zer na/ de shing ljon pa de la yang mi blta 'dab ma la yang mi bgrang bar shing ljon pa de las 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa bzhin du mi nyung mi mang bar 'di snyed cig go zhes
148a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ngo // yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i 'bru de brgya drag ji skad cig yod stong phrag ji skad cig yod/ 'bum drug
148a2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad cig yod/ bye ba phrag ji skad cig yod/ ther 'bum phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khrag khrig phrag ji skad cig yod/ bdakrigs phrag ji skad cig yod// gtams phrag ji skad
148a3(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/ khyad phyin ji snyed cig yod/ mi 'khrugs pa ji snyed cig yod dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig yod/ grangs med pa ji snyed cig yod/ gtan pa ji snyed cig yod/ 
148a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin byed phrag ji snyed cig yod/ stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ glang po che'i stobs phrag ji skad cig yod/ bgrang ba phrag ji skad cig yod ces 'drin de bye ma de
148a5(dkon brtsegs): dag lo'ang mi blta mi bgrang bar bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yo/ da ba bzhin du de snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ste/ bye ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
148a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis 'di snyed yod do zhes mkhyen pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mngon sum du gyur pa ma gtogs pa lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ 
148a7(dkon brtsegs): dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam rlung lha'am na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum ni ma
148a8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'das 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i dus na bram ze sngo sangs
148b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo // yang de'i dus na shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yal ga dang 'dab ma mang pos yog pa/ kho ra khor yug tu tshang rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/ 
148b2(dkon brtsegs): der drang srong snang ba de gnas so// de na gnas pa'i tshe des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis shing n+ya gro de'i rgyal po bzang po de'i yal ga grangs su yod pa lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyi bar du
148b3(dkon brtsegs): bgrangs te/ rtogs par byas shes par byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze sngo sangs shes bya ba grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir/ shing n+ya gra da'i rgyal
148b4(dkon brtsegs): po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas des zas kyi bya ba byas te/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / 
148b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas drang srong snang ba zhes bya bas bram ze sngo sangs shes bya ba la 'di skad ces smraso// 
148b6(dkon brtsegs): kye bram ze mi'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na gang shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po 'di sa ma'i grangs su yod par rtsi ba 'am/ rtogs par byed pa 'am/ shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yod
148b7(dkon brtsegs): dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa mchis so// drang srong gis smras pa/ bram ze de gang yin/ bram zes smras pa/ btsun pa bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o// drang srong gis smras
148b8(dkon brtsegs): pa kye bram ze de'i phyir bgrongs shig/ de nas bram ze sngo sangs de shing ljon pa de la yang mi lta 'dab ma rnams la yang mi bgrang bar skad cig la mdab ma rtog pa la zhugs nas de'i tshe tshig su
149a1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi 'khrugs drug cu bang stengs phrag/ bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag/ bcu gsum dag dang bkrigs pa phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
149a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu dang ni ther 'bum phrag/ brgyad stong dang yang bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis// bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal/ 
149a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad thos nas sngo sangs la// snang bas smras pa bram ze'i mchog/ khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smra ba// legs leg so 'dir bden no// lo ni khyud khor bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma bdun du mngon shes
149a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis// 'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs// gtso bo/ khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen// khyod ni gzigs pa mi mdza dad cing // bgrang ba mi mdzad skad cig du// 'dab ma rtogs
149a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su zhugs// mkhyen 'di nyid kyi'am lha yis bstan// bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs// sngo sangs kyis smras pa/ kye btsun pa gson cig/ 'di ni lha
149a6(dkon brtsegs): yis smras min mi yi ste/ bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/ nam mkha' zad pa grum par 'gyur srid kyi// kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi srid do// snang bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen// 
149a7(dkon brtsegs): po sha ri'i bu// bram ze sngo sangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra// bden la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa yin// zhi ba'i blo gros de
149a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par zad kyi// 
149b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas gong du bsanan/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pa tshad dzin pa'am/ mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba'i le'u nas byas
149b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa'o// / gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la
149b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed
149b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams mi byed do// mngon dpar shes pa las kyang ma nyams la/ ye shesadakyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang byed do// mngon par
149b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas kyang rnam par can la bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// mngon par shes pa la yang gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la yang gnas so// de dag gi mngon par shes pa
149b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// de dag gis mngon par shes pa de ni zad pa'i rnam pa ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'o// 
149b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa ste/ thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs thams cad gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir/ gzugs
149b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems
150a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems la blta ba dang / sems kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog cing blta ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni skal pa mtha' yas pa
150a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa dang / mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon du gyur cing / mngon par
150a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa zad pa'i rjes su mthun pa dang / dus la blta zhing dus las mi yol ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig
150a4(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa 'phags pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
150a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o// de dag gi mngon par sa pa de ni don zab cing bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub cing
150a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mchog yin no// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang 'thun pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de
150a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba thob pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
150a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems yongs su dag pa de nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su byang ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / 
150b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par sbyangs pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog kyang shin tu zad pa dang / mi skye ba nyid du ltung ba
150b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ bsam bzhin du yang 'dir skye la/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'khrugs pa yang med pa/ bcings bzhin du skye ba yang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba yang ma yin/ 
150b3(dkon brtsegs): bcings bzhin du 'byung ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las grol ba'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o// phyin ci log tu
150b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la gnas pa las grol ba'o// des na de grol bzhin du skye'o// grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho'o// grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye yang theg pa chen po las nyams pa med la
150b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis kyang phun sum tshogs so// phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongs su tsholayang mi rnyed mi dmigs so// de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
150b6(dkon brtsegs): dang chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs so// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad kyang chos ma yin la/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin par khas len to// de ci'i
150b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni kun du btsal na yang mi rnyed do// mi dmigs so// chos gang yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal na mi rnyed cing mi dmigs pa de la ni bgrang ba gang yang med de/ 
150b8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa don chos sam/ chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa med do// mngon par
151a1(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa ni chos rnams kyi don to// don la rlom sems su byed pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i gnod pa chen por 'gyur ro// gang la rlom sems med pa la ni don dang ngon
151a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa de'i mdun na mi 'dug go// don du mi blta ba'i blo ni gang du yang thogs pa med do// de ni blo thogs pa med pa'o// gang blo thogs pa med pa de ni chags pa med pa'o// gang chags pa med pa
151a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'o// gang rgyun chad med pa de ni nyams pa med pa'o// gang nyams pa med pa de ni btsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi btsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ba de la skyon med/ 
151a4(dkon brtsegs): gang la skyon med pa de la bdag gi ba med do// gang la bdagadagri ba med pa de la yongs su 'dzin pa med do// gang la yo ngas su 'dzin pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'gyed pa med do// gang la 'gyed pa med pa de ni rtsod pa ste/ dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// / gang dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa de na mkha' dang lag mthil du
151a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'o// gang na mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs so// gzugs kyi khams su ma gtogs so// gzugs med pa'i khamasu mi gtogs so// 
151a7(dkon brtsegs): gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin pa de la ni kha dog med/ rtags med/ dbyibs med do// gang la kha dog med/ rtags med dbyibs med pa de ni de 'dra ba nyid rjes su rtogs so// 
151a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci 'dra ba rjes su rtogs pa de 'dra ba nyid rab tu rtog so// ci'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la rjes su rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i chos
151b1(dkon brtsegs): phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan
151b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba ni gang byams pa yang yin la bdag med pa nyid kyang yin/ snying rje yang yin la sems can med pa nyid kyang yin/ dga' ba yang yin la srog med pa
151b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ btang snyoms kyang yin la gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin/ sbyin pa'ang yin la sems dul ba nyid kyang yin/ tshul khrims kyang yin la sems zhi ba nyid kyang yin
151b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yang yin la sems mi zad pa nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la sems dben pa nyid kyang yin/ dbasam gtan yang yin la sems nges par sems pa nyid kyang
151b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ shes rab kyang yin la rgyu ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang yin/ la dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yang
151b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par spong ba rnams kyang yin la/ yang dag par sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang yin la spros pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dad pa yang yin
151b7(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la lhun gyis grub pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa yang yin la rang 'byung gi sems nyid kyang yin/ ting nge 'dzin
151b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin la mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyi dbang po yang yin la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dbang po rnams kyang yin la chos thams cad la dbang
152a1(dkon brtsegs): po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ stobs rnams kyang yin la mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yin la blos rab tu 'byed
152a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ lam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin la bsgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin zhi gnas kyang yin la sems nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ lhag mthong yang yin la
152a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa yang yin la/ shin du yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa yang yin la yid la
152a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos yid la byed dpa yang yin la chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dge 'dun yid la byed pa yang yin la mi gnas
152a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la bzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang yin la/ chos kyi
152a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings dang / dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yin la/ sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang
152a7(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang yin la ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ mtshan rab tu thob pa yang yin la/ mtshan med pa'i
152a8(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan nyid kyang yin la/ khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid kyang yin/ bdud tshar gcod pa yang yin la sems can thams cad la phan
152b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyang yin chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yin la/ mi 'jug mi ldo/ 
152b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems
152b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems yong su dag par rtogs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang
152b4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no// byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar gyur pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na na mkha'
152b5(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang / thams
152b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags las
152b7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog
152b8(dkon brtsegs): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong
153a1(dkon brtsegs): / gsum mi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang u drug btugayos te/ 'jig rten gyis khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab gyur to// 
153a2(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char mngon par bab po ma skyod par sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra stong snyed rab tu grags par gyur te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya
153a4(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag ni sangs
153a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par byaste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis tebar brtan pa'o// sems can de dag ni sems can rnams
153a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/ sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang pa'i le'u nas
153a7(dkon brtsegs): ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal ba/ ni ba'i blogros
153a8(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te/ 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba su'i mthu lags
153b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ldan zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas
153b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan
153b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag la blta ba'i phyir/ 
153b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi ba'i/ blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa de lus mi snang bar steng gi ber snang la gnas nas/ nga dang
153b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra yang rab tu byung nas/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i
153b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon par de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya bar
153b7(dkon brtsegs): bar snang de las bebs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 
153b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ngab
154a1(dkon brtsegs): nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// yang bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad du 'di lta ste
154a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bstan pa chen po 'di bstan to zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa thob par rngo thogs
154a3(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod legs par 'ongs so// khyod 'dir
154a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang ba pa'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro// sgra dbyangs bsgrags
154a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor de las byang chub sem sa dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i
154a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du skyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la 'dis bsnyen bkur byas 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btab na/ gang phyir 'di 'dra ba'i
154a7(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang ldan par gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros
154a8(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ skal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med par
154b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ skal bar mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
154b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas
154b3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhi bo'i blo gros 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa
154b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' ba lha dang mi mang pos gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gseg/ ma dang gyo mo med pa/ rtsa dag der skyes pa yang 'jam pa
154b5(dkon brtsegs): gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ rma bya'i mgrin bltar sngo zhing g.yung drung 'khyil par g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba
