180b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi smad du 'jig rten gyi khams
180b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
180b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med
180b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma bskyed cig/ gal te mo'u dgal
180b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par song yang khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan
180b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas
180b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma
180b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas bdag gi nongs pa can de nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig nas mchis bcom
181a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// 
181a2(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyis bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas lus dubaste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan
181a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// 
181a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis/ khyod bcom ldan 'das
181a5(dkon brtsegs): de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu gal te/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
181a6(dkon brtsegs): der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te// 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par rab du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
181a7(dkon brtsegs): shar ram lho 'am nub bam byang ngam phyogs gang zhig tu phyin gsol pa bdag phyogs slad de/ gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to// 
181a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
181b1(dkon brtsegs): der 'gro na ni skal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs bka' stsal pa
181b2(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so// de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
181b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di smras so// mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mi mchod pa// ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa// 
181b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su gsol// slar yang zhing 'dir rab tu mchi bar bgyi// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus// bcom ldan
181b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyis bus gsol ba btab pa'i sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang
181b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
181b7(dkon brtsegs): srul pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni mo'u dgal gyi bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/ 
181b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pas/ 
182a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo // kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams
182a2(dkon brtsegs): der mchis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mo'u dgal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang / 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal
182a3(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po
182a4(dkon brtsegs): de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab par
182a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed
182a6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal
182a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la
182a8(dkon brtsegs): gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'od
182b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'drongs te shog cig de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brtan te sems kyis rnam par
182b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
182b3(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag sa la gtugs te/ phyag tshal nos nyes pag shags pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs ched ma mchos pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal na/ de srid du rang du mchis dpas bdag no sa can te nongs pa 'chag so// bcom
182b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'din jitsam pa de tsam legasasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dag sa
182b6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshid gang yang med de/ mo'u dag po bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad ngam
182b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni na mkha'i tshad ngam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ namakha' ji tsam du khyab pa
182b8(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo// gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na med pa yang
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di
183a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa
183a3(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su
183a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnams kyis skal par yang bsam pa/ gzhal dpa'am/ brtsi ba'am/ brtag par mi nus nu/ sems can thams cad kyi lha mos kyang ci dgos
183a5(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par/ bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i
183a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ji snyed pa 'di lta ste sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag go rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la yang de bzhin
183a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong gsum sems can gang yin pa// de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas// skal par
183a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig cig gi/ sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang // nga yis yid 'di shes
183b1(dkon brtsegs): so zhes// de ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems pa dag ni ji snyed pa// 'jig rten mgon po chos ston che// dbyangs kyi yan lag
183b2(dkon brtsegs): de snyed do// chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na// dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa// chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi// chos ston pa yang de tsam mo// sems can
183b3(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa// sems can gcig po'i spu gcig nas// 'od zer 'byung ba de snyed do// 'jig rten mgon po'i spu kun gyi/ 
183b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa/ mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe/ gsung gi yan lag de bas mang // dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyi// skal ba rab tu bston mdzad kyang // 
183b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis ni gsung dbyangs kyi// mtha' ma rnyed/ bar mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis
183b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa// thams cad du ni mi dmigs te/ 
183b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa// shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar tshig ni yod min te// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar nyon mongs rnams
183b8(dkon brtsegs): med cing // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung // gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs shing // de ni
184a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis brjod pa yin// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gan
184a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'ang ma yin no// ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba// sgra 'byin byed pa gang yang med// 'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung // 
184a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir// sems can kun gyi bsam pas bskyed// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang // 'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'// ji ltar brag cha rnams
184a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar dmi yi dbang po'i gsung // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par// snang bas
184a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshim par byed// de ltar rgyal ba'i mit+ta gas gsung // sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
184a6(dkon brtsegs): gi gsang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye ba'i
184a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhag go
184a8(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa des
184b1(dkon brtsegs): bla ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ za ba dang za ba'i rtsa ba dang / zab sel ba dang / za ba 'gog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug
184b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de bar snang gi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jug pa dang // 
184b3(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'jug byed dang / kun du 'jug bral dang / kun du 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / 
184b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / bsregs pa dang / 
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
184b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang / kun bsnyen dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug
184b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi 'di
184b8(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod bsnyen dang / gnod pa zad dang / gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung
185a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/

185a7(dkon brtsegs): de bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / me mur sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang /

185b1(dkon brtsegs): drug pa dang / sdug da du ga gal ba dang / sdug par 'khor zhes byar// 'di sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung bdang / drug rtsam /

186b8(dkon brtsegs): min gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin tu mthar thug dang mi rtog pa dang / nying mtsha mos sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros
187a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi yang gzhan no// gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan mo// dri za rnams kyi
187a2(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan no// lha ma yin rnams kyi yang gzhan no// namakha' lding rnams kyi yang gzhan no// mi'am ci rnams kyi yang gzhan no// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi yang gzhan no//

187a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/ brda yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin/ 
187a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad / pa rnams kyi bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/ 'di/ ste/ yul ka sha dang / bcu ba dang / zas
187a6(dkon brtsegs): yul dang / ya ba na dang / kam po tsa dang / kha sha dang / kun dang / rgyu yul dang / dar ta dang / u ra sha dang / bi lin dang / so ma dang / bram ze dang/

187b1(dkon brtsegs): gdong dang spyi bo gcugs dang / gnam gdong po dang / phyi phyogs gdong dang / byang phyogs gdong dang / rjes su rgyug dang / rgya mtsho khol ba dang / yul mthas
187b2(dkon brtsegs): gtugs pa dang / ang ku ra dang / mang ku ra dang / sna med dang / klo bkra dang / phyogs kyi gcer bu dang / gshog thogs gcer bu dang / dgus te 'gro dang
187b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byed rnam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gos gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang
187b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i tshig dang / brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin dgashegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming du tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang // de bzhin
187b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhingarnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin par 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi
187b6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di na bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ bden pa stan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang / 
187b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs
187b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// // bam po lnga pa// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams
188a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dgas pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyise mnyis la ba'o// nangar zugs phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chad med grangs med/ 
188a2(dkon brtsegs): padag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i
188a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung nas sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu
188a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang sa shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la nga shA ri'i bu lta bu sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye des gang yin pa'i shes rab dang ye shes de sems can gcig
188a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur rnam grangs 'das sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par/ gyur la ni nga' blo gros sems can de dag rnams
188a6(dkon brtsegs): cang kyis bskal pa 'am skal ba las lhag par mchom mo dra ba bsams shing gzhal te yongs su bas la na sems can gcig gi'i chom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa'is
188a7(dkon brtsegs): yin zhingazhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol togs pa srid la the chom kyi
188a8(dkon brtsegs): dring dag gsol kyang desems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bathung nas gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dra ba thams cad gcod de/ dedag
188b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ca rang rang gis chom madra chad bar shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis nus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems sadab gyur te/ ni pa'i bla gas de ltar ma
188b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod cing sems can thams cad kyi so mnyi la kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa'am/ 
188b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la mdzad pa de yang mdadade/ na ba'i blogs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gas pa'o// 'di ni gsung rmang du byung ba'o// 'di ni gsu
188b4(dkon brtsegs): mangs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gi gsang pa di dgasang ba ba'i bdag pa lagan rdo rnas pa shad pa'i ga chags
188b5(dkon brtsegs): sum gro nyis stong pa bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa bya chub tu sems bskyed do// gaskal ba bzang ba byung chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ning gang dang gang nasangs
188b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma ldan 'das rnams kyi mang rgyangs par snad paspyod par byang chub sems dpa'i di dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog rnams kyis kyang gta
188b7(dkon brtsegs): na tsha'i jugs rnams cadag // de nas mi tag dge bcom ldan 'das kyi skul yang log/ gsang pa pa'i di dag po lagan rje'i lus la yang mom cing 'khor thams ca
188b8(dkon brtsegs): lamang 'tha'o// rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi ster na 'dug go// rin po che'i gdugs de dag las
189a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes su gzung ba'i slad du skal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so nas smra byung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
189a3(dkon brtsegs): dengo mtshar du gyur nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes mthong ba dang
189a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba sam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par brnyed do// gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi za bar
189a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mo nyid rnyed pa ra 'gyur ro// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par
189a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
189a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa
189a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ning du bstan to// bsnyad do// yang dag par bshad do// 
189b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring po mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba
189b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs pa dang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
189b3(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 
189b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po yang phab po// sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra yang byung nga ngo // sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub
189b5(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med
189b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par
189b7(dkon brtsegs): byas so// de nas 'khor gyi khyams de'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du
189b8(dkon brtsegs): byung bar snang ngo // de dag steng gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus
190a1(dkon brtsegs): chag chag btab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i
190a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
190a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang 'di ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 
190a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon bar 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig pa dang / lta bar 'gyur ba'i sgo glegs bcag nas chos
190a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang / shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems
190a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams tshim par 'gyur te 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i
190a7(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros lo 'di skad ces smras// 
190a8(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs med pa na
190b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis skal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par
190b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'brang ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin
190b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste/ gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang
190b4(dkon brtsegs): gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi
190b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' thugs la rtogs pa mi mnga' thugs la rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga' thugs la 'gyur ba mi mnga' thugs la tshad mi mnga'
190b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs la 'khrul pa mi mnga' thugs la sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yeng ba mi mnga'/ thugs la khengs pa ma mnga' thugs la dma' ba mi mnga' thugs la
190b7(dkon brtsegs): kun du srung ba mi mnga' thugs la rgyu ba mi mnga' thugs la shin tu rings pa mi mnga' thugs la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga' thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ 
190b8(dkon brtsegs): thugs la g.yo ba mi mnga' thugs la nges par sems pa mi mnga' thugs la dgyes pa mi mnga' thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/ 
191a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs la rab tu rgyub mi mnga' thugs la rtogs pa mi mnga' / thugs la rnam par rtogs pa mi mnga'/ thugs la yongs su rtogs pami
191a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ thugs la zhi ba'i gnas mi mnga' thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga' thugs la rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma mnga'/ rang gi thugs la gnas pa mi mnga'
191a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis sems la blta ba mi mnga' thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs gzugs
191a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa mi mnga' thugs sgra dang / dri da dang ro dang reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs chos da la gnas pa mi mnga'// thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga' / thug y-i
191a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga' thugs phyi rol na gnas pa mi mnga'o// thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go// thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go// 
191a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs de 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ thugs kyis chos gang
191a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug go// rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag
191a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi gzigs te// de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go// gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do// gzigs pas gzigs pa dang / rnam par
191b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa mi gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes
191b2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna bas thos pa
191b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ 
191b4(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin la de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ chos thams/ cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yang yin no// de'i nga
191b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni mnga' bar gnas so// sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad
191b6(dkon brtsegs): la gzigs so// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
191b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgom pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du
191b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la ting nge'adzin gyi gnas kyang ma'i dor ro// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
192a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang mdzad la/ de'i chos thams cad la chags pa mi mngar ba'i ye shes kyang gang du sang mi chags so// ni nga'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dpen
192a2(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga' yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ sku'i 'du byed
192a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi mnga' gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do// 
192a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang / mtshungs pas mnyam mo// sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go// de la sku'i rtsom pa dang / gsung
192a5(dkon brtsegs): gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/ de/ yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par
192a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
192a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 
192a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams la gnas pa ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyil
192b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na mtho/ 
192b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la
192b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor rtag pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa/ 
192b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blogros de ltar de bzhin gshegs dpa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga'o// de chos gang ya/ du mngon par mi sgrub la/ sems can la thugs rtsebs
192b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa/ mi mnga' zhing thags pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de yang
192b6(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/ mnyam par gnag
192b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes
192b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag
193a1(dkon brtsegs): na skal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
193a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi slad na yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu bya ba 'dri bsam gyis mi khyodab kyis zhog shig
193a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi shA ri'i bu gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas
193a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom/ ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par mchi'o// 
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa
193a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di sngon ni bdag gis nam yang ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po
193a7(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje 'di ni skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyang rgyab na yang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad
193a8(dkon brtsegs): du yang lag na rdo rjes gzugs su sku bston to// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi
193b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyab rgyab tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjes lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang des ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro// 
193b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te sngon ni ma mthong ngo // 
193b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal po 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na khyad kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'am brgya byin namatshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong
193b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyu ba na lag na rdo// rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo // shA ni/ 
193b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / skal po bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ sa sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag
193b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rgyab nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste/ byin gyis brlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin
193b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyub na yang 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye
193b8(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs dang ldan no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// 
194a1(dkon brtsegs): des byung chu ba mam dpa nang bru zla gyis gang pa par bag pa gan la 'dzin ce slas so// gsang bab nga klu nga chung du
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la brnams te/ de ni rmang du drung
194a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba dang / gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon
194a4(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/ de dag ni tshe'i tshad skal par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste/ bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig
194a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig ma yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas
194a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad do// dka' thub dang / lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang / lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par snyoms pa de bas ches khyad par du
194a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa 'am ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang / brtul zhugs dang dko' thub gang dag gis bya bas kun du bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas
194a8(dkon brtsegs): kun du bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gos ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcig gcugs te 'dug par mthong kha cig gis ni lag pa btegs te 'dug par mthong / 
194b1(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni nyim lta zhing 'dug par mthong kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mdzong kha cig gis ni tsogatsog por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong
194b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni rkang pa gtsug te mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgrengs te 'dug par mthong kha cig gis ni kha phub du 'dug par mthong / kha cig
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni cher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal ba mthong/ kha cig gis ni rdo le ba la dkyil mo dkrungs bcos te 'dug par mthong
194b4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni brtsig pa la brnyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la brnyes pa dang / kha cig gis nig rkun shing la brnyes pa dang / kha cig gis phyag dang
194b5(dkon brtsegs): khrod na nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su ba sgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsi mun dza'i gos gyon pa
194b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa bal pa dza'i gos gyon pa dang kha cig gis ni rtsa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri rigs kyi lpags pa'i gyon pa dang kha cig
194b7(dkon brtsegs): gI ni rtswa cir gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni bsgren mor 'dug pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang
194b8(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni srid za ba dang / kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni rtsi bza ba dang / lom za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang
195a1(dkon brtsegs): sdong bu za ba dang gzegs ma za ba dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang / zhag drug smyung ba dang / sha mi za ba dang / rgya shugs za ba dang / 
195a2(dkon brtsegs): nas shin ta ma za ba dang / ci tse za ba dang / mon sran sde'u za ba dang / mon sran gre'u za ba dang / bra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang / chu
195a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis mtsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni
195a4(dkon brtsegs): zas mi za ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' shig tu
195a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang dka' ba spyod pa ched med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/ lo drug tshang bar spyod
195a6(dkon brtsegs): lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to// brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dka'
195a7(dkon brtsegs): thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul shugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang / sems can gzhan dang gzhan la ma mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub gzhan dang gzhan
195a8(dkon brtsegs): du mi mthong ste/ gzhan du ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba ni ma
195b1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag la kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyad pa
195b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug su rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag gis ni byang
195b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing mkhar khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi g.yo ba dang / bde ba myong ba dang / lo drug lon nas byung
195b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo // // zhi ba'i blo gros de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni
195b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chang/ par chos ston par mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'dzi ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba ye shes chen
195b6(dkon brtsegs): po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad
195b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug chang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub de dag las langs te/ klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du song
195b8(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten dang mthun par khrus bya'o// lus gcang mor byas nas/ klung ni rin dzan nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to// den grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya 'dis bsnong
196a1(dkon brtsegs): gi 'o ma skol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i'o thug khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ngo // gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
196a2(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu yang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/ so so nas tshig 'di skad du
196a3(dkon brtsegs): kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig zer ro// zhi ba'i blo gros des na byang chub sems dpas grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs
196a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lce dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za bye ba khrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi kha zas de dag blang ngas nas thams cad zos kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo // lha'i
196a5(dkon brtsegs): bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gis bshos pa/ sol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
196a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so// de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/ 
196a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpas zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o// zas len pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag
196a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te byang chub
196b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo // der song ba dang / sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bus bzangs zhes bya bas sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras pa/ sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi spyod pa/ 
196b2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drang byon// sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// leg so zhes te sa la spyod rnams dga'// stong gsum
196b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed// me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs// spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab// lag na gzhod thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs// 
196b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin par snang la// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'// de tshe me tog sna tshogs rab tu phab// gling bzhi pa dag rnams na
196b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong ba'i gzhi// ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te// rnam par 'dren la mchod par bya ba'i phyir// gser gyi dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab// stong
196b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khong mdzes pa// de ltas stong gsum thams cad mdzes par
196b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyan// 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste// skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun// namakha' be DUzla'i dra
196b8(dkon brtsegs): bas bkab// dga' ldan rapa dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang // de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byaso// rgyan phreng de bzhin bla gam rnams kyang thogs// mu tig sil ma'i tshor yang
197a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bebs// lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar// rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra bas gser gyi dar bcas nas/ 
197a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkag/ thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir// dbang bsgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che// rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// 'od
197a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal dri med dra ba cig kyang sprul// klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang // lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci kun gyis// rang rang gnas nas bkod pa rnams kyis ni// 'dod khams legs par brgyan
197a4(dkon brtsegs): nas mdzes par byas// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang bsgyur zhes bya bas byang chub se/ dmas dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas
197a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bsnams pa/ dam bcas pa chen
197a6(dkon brtsegs): po ma bor ba go cha sre ba brnabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad nges par byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thad kyi pha rol du byon pa
197a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa
197a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin du zhugs pa bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad la yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi mjog pa/ 
197b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
197b2(dkon brtsegs): 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa/ 
197b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyis gzungs ma
197b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyel pa/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo dab/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin du dri ma
197b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa shin du dkar ba 'i blo dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba/ sems las su rung
197b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi snga rab tu 'dul ba dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / 
197b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / 
197b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcad pa/ 
198a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang
198a2(dkon brtsegs): brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying po bzhud kyis de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba spro bar gyis shig/ de nas stong gsum gyi
198a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po de yid rab tu dga' nas tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa grogs po dag bskal pa stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa
198a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzhud kyis / de la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan pa gyis shig/ de nas
198a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtu/ la zhugs chos nges pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la
198a6(dkon brtsegs): phan bzhed pa// lha dang mi yi mchod pa lha yi lha// thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs// bde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
198a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bkang dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang // sems can
198a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tshim par bya ba dang // dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang // sngon gyi
198b1(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas yongasu bskang ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dug nas ni/ sa mi/ 
198b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye// 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos// 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin/ 
198b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya// tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba// 
198b4(dkon brtsegs): de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag bstan// me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang // rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la sogs 'og
198b5(dkon brtsegs): min lha yi rnams// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang // dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas// rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas/ 
198b6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang // lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas// byang chub rdo rje gdan ni brgyan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun
198b7(dkon brtsegs): du chag cha ga 'debs// me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed// sa gzhi dag las rin chen rnams kyang bkram// byang chub snying por brgyan rnams rab tu bston// thams cad tshig gis
198b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod par mi nus pa// de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshang pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshangs
199a1(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa sprad pa sems
199a2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di byang chub kyi snying por gzhud kyis de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan pa gyis shig
199a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// phan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad
199a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid che// de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du/ shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud// thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong bar bya// stong gsum mijed 'di dag
199a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par bya// 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang // yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas gyur// tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas// stong gsum
199a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus brgyan byed cing // legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// 'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang // bye ba'i gdug
199a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams na mkhar de dag sprul// sa la'i shing rnams me tog mchog smras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul// lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa// de ni shing rta bdun
199a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnams tshad du sprul// rin chen gzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram// kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag lha mi rnams kyi sngon ma
199b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong // sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar// de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'og min
199b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rnams// stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni// byang chub snying po dam pa brgyan par byed// byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni// 'dod pa'i khams
199b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan// phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mi bye ba lhags// me tog rnams dang spos dang
199b4(dkon brtsegs): byug pa yis// byang chub shing ni mngon du brgyan par byed// / spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs// byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te// sum cu rtsa
199b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra// lha rnams bya ba dag gis ma dzes sprul pa// bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nu sa// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
199b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por 'gro ba na rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
199b7(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyud bcad do// klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub
199b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'khor la tshig su bcad pas smras pa// gsar
200a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od// gnas 'dir lha der gyur pas na// khro ba'i lus 'di rab tu tshim// sems kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// kho bos sngon gyi sangs
200a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi// ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni// gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// legs par phye ma phreng ba dang // me tog spos dang byug pa dang / 
200a3(dkon brtsegs): gser dang nor bu mu tig dang // dung dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang // rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// ba dan dag kyang bsgreng byas te// ston
200a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni mchod par bya// klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di la/ da bzang po'i brgyan rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rab tu dag da' ba yis// sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya// de nas klu'i
200a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po nag po chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas// gnyen gyi 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
200a6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ 
200a7(dkon brtsegs): spos chu sa gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas spos chu'i char pa ni 'bebs klu'i me tog dang / me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub
200a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang / sil snyan len pa dang
200b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu mchog gi 'od 'di rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir
200b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang bar 'gyur// skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi// nag po'i gnas kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur// klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas// rab tu dga' ste de tshe tshig smras pa/ 
200b3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi mdog gi 'od kyis khyab par gyur// de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du gdon mi za// klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun 'dar te// gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su/ 
200b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de ni gau lar song // phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug/ sa kun rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes par brgyan// shing
200b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog kun dang sman dang rtsa rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud// 'di na yod pa'i chu klung thams cad mi 'babs mkha'/ la rlung mi ldang // de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten
200b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla ba'i 'od mi snang // mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song gsum po ni// bdag gi gnas su
200b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par byed// de rang rgyal ba byon par 'gyur gyis dgyes mdzad rangs shing tshim pa bskyed// bum pa gang ba 'di dag na mkhar song ste khyod la bskor ba dang / 
200b8(dkon brtsegs): rtswa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag na mkhar song ste khyod la bskor ba dang // lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa la// de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur ning // 
201a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed gzi brjid che ldan pa// mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin
201a2(dkon brtsegs): gser thub bcas na bya ba mchod// mi mchog 'od srung dang ni shAkya'i mchog khyod de ring bdag gis mchod// bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don du gnyer// sa ni
201a3(dkon brtsegs): grum zhing ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med gyur srid// su zhig byang chub tu ni sems nges lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa// de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni
201a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis ma lags// seng ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung shig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces
201a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tshogs
201a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna
201a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che me tog sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la mthor zhing tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi dang mi snyengs
201a8(dkon brtsegs): bag gi tshe// mi zhum mi dman rab dgyes mi chags mi mnga' ba// sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba// rnam grol drang srong chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// 
201b1(dkon brtsegs): dogs bral zug rngu bral zhing dul la ma rig sel// 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel// gnas dang skyabs dang gling ma mchis pa mkhyen nas ni// gnas khyod skyabs khyod
201b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum po dag tu byung // ji ltar lha'i tshogs rnams dad cing rab dga' ste// mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang // ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor ba bgyid lags
201b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar dang 'gyur snyam// dgyes bskyed shing dbang drung gshegs mi stangs bzhugs mdzod la// bdud sde pham par mdzod de nyon mongs dra ba drol// ji ltar sngon gyi
201b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub rab mtsho dag zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod// gang gi tshad du khyed kyis bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba de dag ni dgrol phyir dka' ba
201b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang spyad// khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te// byang chub mchog la rig par mdzad do'i dus 'di lags/ 
201b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po drug pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas byang chub snying po ga la der song ste 'gro ba na/ lam gyis g.yas rol na rtsa 'tshong
201b7(dkon brtsegs): bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtsa brda zhing 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong ste/ lha rnams kyis bskul nas rtsa 'jam pa shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams
201b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yid dga' ba dang / yid dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu dga' ba khyil ba/ g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / 
202a1(dkon brtsegs): kacan da ga gan de gras/ rlung chu semam dpa gal pa ma nas byin padang / sna gang byang chub rnams pa
202a2(dkon brtsegs): byin te bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phye bar byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtswa yang byin
202a3(dkon brtsegs): no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rtsa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te/ ji ltar kho bo skal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
202a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por khri shes pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu
202a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba
202a6(dkon brtsegs): kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la dge slong stong thams pa tshangs par/ 
202a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa spyad nas bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes de dag lung bstan to// 
202a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
202b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na seng ge'i khri byi dor bya'o// zhes smon lam btab bo// ni ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus
202b2(dkon brtsegs): na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra
202b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sems
202b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis mos pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du de kha cig la ni rtswa spar gang 'bul bar 'gyur/ kha cig la ni rarin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i
202b5(dkon brtsegs): khri 'bul bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi
202b6(dkon brtsegs): skon bu thogs pa dang / spos dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
202b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
202b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid chen po mi snyengs dpa' zhing dul zhi ba// dges shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba nyams dgas kha na ma tho ma mnga' ba// skyon las grol ba ston pa khyod la phyag
203a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la// khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po cig/ 'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams spang ba'i/ 
203a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir phyung ba// sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing rab tu dga' ba yis// lha'i me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs pa las// bdud dag sde
203a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring brnyes su nges// shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su// bdud btul nas ni mun pa thams cad
203a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhom par mdzod// ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgya das pa// de ltar byang chub zhi pa mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod// ji ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du ni// 
203a5(dkon brtsegs): skal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyis/ shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ 
203a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtswa sbar gang khyer nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du bdag nyid kyis rtsa'i gding ba bting nas byang chub kyi shing
203a7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rtsa'i gding ba bting ma thag tu/ de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug
203a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thob yangs pa rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer can rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi
203b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan phreng rab tu dbyangs pa/ ras bcos bu brgya stong dum bting ba brgyad khri ba ni stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du ba sham so// ni ba'i bla gros de nas byang chub sems dpa'as seng ge'i khri brgyad khri
203b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong po de dag thams cad la bdag nyid 'dug pas kun tu bstan par gyur to// lha'i bu de dag gis kyang gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong mi shes te/ lha'i bu re res kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems
203b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khre la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
203b4(dkon brtsegs): bar shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// byang chub kyi snying por
203b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu de nas
203b6(dkon brtsegs): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i bar nas bdud bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i bdud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go
203b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od des de dag la reg ma thag tu rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du spu zing zhes byed de rang gi bdud kyi gnas tshig cing mog mog por gyur par shes nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi
203b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir gnas 'di dag mog mog por gyur par snang ba 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod/ rkyen ni ci zhig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am gcig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag
204a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur grang snyam ste/ rnam par bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la
204a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bdud re re yang gnod sbyin kha dog rnam pa mang po dang / cha byad rnam pa mang po dang / dbyibs rnam
204a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mang po dang / chu zheng rnam pa mang po dang / g.yo ba rnam pa mang po dang / mgo rnam pa mang po dang / mtshon cha rnam pa mang po dang / rgyal mtshan rnam pa mang po thogs pa bye ba khrag
204a4(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong dag gis bskor te smra ba rnam pa mang pos smra zhing nga / bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos bdu du re res kyang bdud kyi 'khor gyis rgyar dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri ste/ 
204a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bkang nas byang chub kyi shing drung du dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'khor chen po de dag dong ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe yid du mi 'ong ba mnyan par
204a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'os pa/ mi snyan pa u dug ces bya ba dang / pi chog ces bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba dang / rgyob cig zung cig sod cig chings shig ces bya ba'i sgra chen po de lta bu phyung bar gyur to// gal te 'dod
204a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang ma bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sgra de mi thos la/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te byang chub sems dpas sgra de mi grag par ma byas na ni de dag kha nas khrag dron mo skyug cing 'chi ba 'am/ 
204a8(dkon brtsegs): shil thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur ro// de na ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos nan pas sems can la rnam par 'tsho bar gyur du 'ong zhes sgra de mi grag par byas par gyur to// 
204b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i yul yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros sgra de lta bu de thos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na spu g.yos par yang ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe// 
204b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'di dag thams cad brag cha dang mtshungs par legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lhags par rigs nas
204b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can de dag bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bzlog par byed de/ sdig can dag phongs par 'gyur ba gdon par dka ba rnam pa 'di lta bur 'di dag gis ci zhig byas thong zhing / de ci'i
204b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sdig can khyed ni gyang stobs chung ngu la gyang stob da sa chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brdeb/ sa par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni dpa' bo chen pos
204b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar da mod byang chub sems dpas pham par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni srin bu ma khyer la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar ngo mod byang chub
204b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni phub ma sbar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni shing sA la chen po
204b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba nas chad pa ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni ri dgas kyi tshogs la seng ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas dngangs par byas par 'gyuraro// 
204b8(dkon brtsegs): sdig can khyod ni brdzas kyi tshu la nyi tshan bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongasu zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar
205a1(dkon brtsegs): do mang byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed na mo g.yon can dgags par bya ba shor ba ltar nga mang byang chub sems dpas
205a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni tshong ba lam rgyags mang po mes tshig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo bo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal
205a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni khrung khrung rgan po mngab ma bregs pa ltar nga mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su
205a4(dkon brtsegs): bcug par 'gyur ro// srog can khyed ni 'drog dgon pa de ro lam rgyags chad bltar da med byang chub sems dadapas rings par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig cam byed ni N+DI
205a5(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru zhig bltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro// / sdig can khyed ni bsreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar
205a6(dkon brtsegs): do mo byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni rdol ba rdo rje chen po bab par ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ron pa'i blo gros de ltar byang / 
205a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can rnams bzlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can de dag phyir mi log go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' skal pa grangs
205a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
205b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
205b2(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba yongs su sbyang ba byas pas lag pa
205b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon la shin tu gzhon pa gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa brkyang ste snying rje chen pos bskyod pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i lhag po'i bsam pas spyi bo
205b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bzung ste lus thams cad la byugs nas 'jig rten gyi kha mas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon du bya te/ dran pa dang / ldan zhing shes bzhin
205b5(dkon brtsegs): dus chen po la btabs so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas sa chen po la brdabs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sa chen po rna ba drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos// 
205b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs so// rab tu 'khrugs so// 
205b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur ro// rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem mo// rab tu chem chem mo// kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shar
205b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho'o// nub phyogs dmAn shar phyogs mtha'o// lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho'o// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho'o// mtha' mthon
206a1(dkon brtsegs): na dbus dma'o// dbus mthon mtha' dma'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad dus g.yos pa chen po 'jig
206a2(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'ur sgra dang / rtug chem gyi sgra chen po dang / zung shig pa dang / rgyob cig pa dang / chings cig pa dang / song
206a3(dkon brtsegs): cig pa'i sgra thos so// bdud kyi 'khor gyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthus steng gi bar snang la 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di thos so// drang srong nang na drang srong mchog/ 'di ni mi 'jigs
206a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ste// srog chags kun gyi skyabs yin gyis// / 'di la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// zhi ba'i blo gros bdud kyi 'khor gyis sgra de thos pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba
206a5(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas phub tu sa la 'gyel nas skyes bu chen po yongs su bskyab du gsol yongs su bskyab du gsol zhes tshig 'di skad ces smras so// 
206a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can lhag ma rnams ni dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'bros par 'dod na 'bros ma nus nas de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od byung ba dang / 
206a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od des de dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rang rang gis gnas su dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di bstan pa na bdud kyi 'khor de la
206a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu
206b1(dkon brtsegs): ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// lha'i bu sngon sbyang ba byas pa bye ba brgyad khrib ni stong na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thong bar gyur to// bdud bdug
206b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// / zhi ba'i blo gros de lta lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltar bdud 'dul ba tshad med pa dang ldan par shes so// 
206b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni bdud yang thams cad du ma 'ongs par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpas rtswa bting ba la 'dug par shes so// kha cog gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rim
206b4(dkon brtsegs): po che'i pad+ma dkod po'i seng ge'i khril 'dug par mthong ngo // / kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
206b5(dkon brtsegs): namakha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mtho ngo // kha cig gos ni byang chub kyi shing shing ni rgyal po a shwad thar mthong ngo // kha cig cig gis ni
206b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing yongs 'dus tol tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can du mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta
206b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing ta la'i phyed tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing ta la phyed dang gnyis srid tsam
206b8(dkon brtsegs): du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri dpag tshad bzhi khris nyis stong par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig gis
207a1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pal brtson 'dul bar mdzong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud cig mthong // kha cig gis ni bdud rtsa chen po
207a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // kha cig gis byang chub sems dpa' bdud brtse bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing na mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing
207a3(dkon brtsegs): drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha'
207a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'khod pa de dag gi yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni tshad med par snang ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas
207a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug pa dang / sngon mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs medadapag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
207a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa dag nas lhags te mi 'jigs pa'i sgra brjod cing / shis pa'i sgra dang / bde ba'i sgra dang / kun dga' ba'i sgra dang / mgyogs pa'i sgra dang / myur ba'i sgra
207a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / legs pa'i sgra dang / don yod pa'i sgra dang / dpa' ba'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / rgyas pa'i sgra dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra dang / 
207a8(dkon brtsegs): mi gdung ba'i sgra dang / ma zhum pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang / spong bdon yod pa'i sgra dang // yid bde ba'i sgra dang / rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu
207b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnam par chen pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i sgra dang / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i/ 
207b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogaso bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
207b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbugs 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems
207b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/ des na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dang / da' de dag byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la
207b5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byin cing mchod pa byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la yang rje su chags pa med la bdud kyi sde la yang kho khro ba med do// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa
207b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang
207b7(dkon brtsegs): chub par bya ba gang ci yang rung ste thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang
207b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu yod bdag gis phyag g.yas brkyang ste/ skum bsnyel tam zhes spun gsol to// bsnyil pa mi mnga' bar byang chub bam / rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
208a1(dkon brtsegs): bam/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub 'am/ kun du/ 
208a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam spyod yul ma 'dres pa dang ldan nam/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sam/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsabs sam
208a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ram zhes yongs su 'dri'o// de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so// sems can gang dag dbang po yongasu
208a4(dkon brtsegs): ma smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de mi shes so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzums par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde
208a5(dkon brtsegs): ba nyams su bstar te/ spun mi 'dzums par byang chub kyi shing la yang gzigaso// lha'i bu brgya stong yang de la mchod de bstod de phyag 'tshal lo//
