208a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
208a7(dkon brtsegs): tu sems kyang bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi lhung bzed rnams thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong bar
208a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ste rgyal po chen po bzhi dag go/ 
208b1(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag brgya nas rgyal po bye ba khrag bzhi brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo // zhi ba'i
208b2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pas lhung bzed bye ba phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas rgyal po chen po re ra yang 'di snyam du de bzhin
208b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed bzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid
208b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir da mi ldog par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin dgashegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshong pa ga gon dang
208b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te/ de dag ni sngon 'di skad du bdag cag gis de bzhin
208b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bul lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba
208b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste/ 
208b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi sems dang po
209a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
209a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gtsug phung
209a3(dkon brtsegs): can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom
209a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir sems can chos kyi snod du gyur pa
209a5(dkon brtsegs): dag mchis te de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos/ bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs
209a6(dkon brtsegs): pas chos bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo// de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste gang gi/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas bdag gis bskal pa bzang po
209a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes smon lam btab pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros tshangs pa gtsugs phud can nyid kyis
209a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar
209b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa gtsugs phud can gyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to// brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang
209b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
209b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gnang ba de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis grong khyer wA ra Na si drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong yod pa
209b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bkra ba da lta na sdug pa sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to// / ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs
209b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i seng ge'i khri ba shams par gyur pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcu dang brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa
209b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bkra ba lta na sdug pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mo tshig dang ldan pa bshams par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan
209b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das grong khyer chen po wA ra Ni si ga la ba dang / drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags tshal ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas/ seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la bdag nyid bzhugs
209b8(dkon brtsegs): par kun du bstan to// de na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur bar
210a1(dkon brtsegs): shes te de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 
210a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas de'i
210a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de
210a4(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam par gyur par gnas te lag mthil ltar gyur to// / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems/ 
210a5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba pa'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa 'am mi'am lha'am/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag
210a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nyon mongs
210a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyis gnod pa med cing cig la cig pha ma tsam du 'du shes te/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
210a8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags
210b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
210b2(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / namakhar dzI dang / mi'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khong pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir
210b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ngo // ni ba'i blo gros de ltar de'i tshe snong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa dbang che ba dbang che ba
210b4(dkon brtsegs): grags bdag gis sa phyogs gang khyab par ma gyur pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha gzhag pa tsam yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par
210b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyod pas/ thams cad
210b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am gang yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// 
210b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo da ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun du shes te/ sems can thams
210b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim pa'i bar bya ba'i phyir bskor te gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub
211a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
211a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du ko'u di n+ya mig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngal gyi
211a3(dkon brtsegs): sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thos so// bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so// stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig
211a4(dkon brtsegs): snying ngo zhes thos so// zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mi gzhi ba'o zhes thos so// dben pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig dben pa'o zhes thos so// mi rtag pas
211a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so// gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig gnas me da pa'o zhes thos so// sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams
211a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes thos so// rmi lam lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos so// chu zla lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes
211a7(dkon brtsegs): thos so// mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so// brag cha lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag cha lta bu zhes thos so// de bzhin du
211a8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa
211b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / mabyung bar thos so// rten cing 'brel bar
211b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so// mig la ji lta ba bzhin du yid kyi bar du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ngo zhes thos so// 
211b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung
211b4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa dang / kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so// kha cig gis ni skye mched bdag med pa'o// // zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag
211b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du thos la khams la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la phung po la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni
211b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni lam gyi
211b7(dkon brtsegs): sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni yang dag pa'i spong ba'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul
211b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni stobs kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam du
212a1(dkon brtsegs): thos so// kha cig gis ni lam gyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni ni gnas kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni lhag mthong gi
212a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni bden pa'i gtam du zos so// kha cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan
212a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du zos so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
212a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos dkyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang
212a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de dag bgra nga ba'i rtogs pas lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 
212a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud btul ba dang / bkod pa dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol pa dang / 
212a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgya khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems can tshad med pa
212a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
212b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad ces bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'am/ cig tu ma
212b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur lags sam/ 'on te de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa rjes su 'thun pa'am cig tu lta'ang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bsnun pa ni zab
212b3(dkon brtsegs): lags bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
212b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni 'di da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gis lus la
212b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa lags kyi/ 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de de bzhino// 
212b6(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su 'gro ba'i phyir chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de
212b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma
212b8(dkon brtsegs): brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smras pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zho na// de bzhin
213a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rigs pa shes par ram/ mnyan par ram bsha
213a2(dkon brtsegs): pabar nus pa su zhig yod gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog du yang dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o// de bzhin gshegs
213a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa dang / 
213a4(dkon brtsegs): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom da ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ra byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa
213a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan to bsnyad do// rab tu bshad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / yid ches
213a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ri 'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo bos bsgyel ba 'am phrag pa la thogs
213a7(dkon brtsegs): par nus kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram dad par ram yid ches par yang mi nus na/ blang bar ram/ 
213a8(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya bar ram gzung bar ram sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan
213b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam
213b2(dkon brtsegs): bde dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par
213b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gsang ba po'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/ gnyis la ma yin/ gsum la ma yin/ bzhi la ma yin/ lnga la
213b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas dmang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / yongasu sbyang ba
213b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa khon btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bya chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol
213b6(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi nga nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang lags gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar ni bzhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
213b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun du rtog pa dang / rnam par
213b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la
214a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya 'di ni phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// phyin
214a2(dkon brtsegs): ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// 
214a3(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa dang srid pa'i srid pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes
214a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// / ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// 
214a5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta bar nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na dmigs pa dang / rgyu dang lta
214a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo // 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhe na lta ba thams cad nye bar zhi'o// / 
214a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na smon pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhin nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste
214a8(dkon brtsegs): dper na shing gi rtsa ba bcad na yal ga dang lo ma dang / yal ka phre'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar ni na nyon mongs
214b1(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jig
214b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par gyur na/ nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'byung ste/ gnod par mi 'gyur ro// ni ba'i blo gros kyis gsol ba/ 
214b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig chogs
214b4(dkon brtsegs): lalta ba yongs su shes pa'o// sems can kun nas mi slong ba dang / srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes
214b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas so// lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i
214b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te/ stong pa nyid
214b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
214b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs shes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig
215a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// ni ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba don tshogs ma yin pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa/ 
215a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/ de ni bzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun brtags pa'o// 'byung ba ma yin ning kun brtags pa gang yin pa donani yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ 
215a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par brtag pa ma yin no// yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa bsla
215a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pam yin pa dang / bslang ba ma yin pa dang / shes par
215a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa nye bar zhi ba dang zhes/ bgyi ba gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/ 
215a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/ gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro// ma 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 
215a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na me ni rgyu la 'bar gyi/ rgyu med na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi dmigs po med na
215a8(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar 'gyur ro// // bam po bdun pa// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes
215b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do// nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi
215b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed la pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa yang bskyed do// bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa yang spong la byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos la dmigs pa yang mi
215b3(dkon brtsegs): spong ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa yang mi len la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa yang mi 'dor ro// stong pa nyid du/ 
215b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog la sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang blta'o// dazhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
215b5(dkon brtsegs): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmig/ sa pa la dbang thob ste/ ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la yang nges par sems la bsams bzhin du skye bar
215b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo // mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dmigs pa la yang 'jug la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa'i dmigs pa yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// 
215b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la yang spyod la byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa yang chung ma gson to// smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa yang rnam par mthong la khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa
215b8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi smong // shes rab dong thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par gyur te/ de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
216a1(dkon brtsegs): drug pa la sems gnas so// mi rtag pa la dmigs nas 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du gnas so// sdug bsngal la dmigs nas sems
216a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so// bdag med pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas so// 'dod
216a3(dkon brtsegs): chags la dmigs nas sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// zhe sdang la dmigs nas sems can zhe sdang la
216a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// gti mug la dmigs nas sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten
216a5(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod po rnams la mi rtag pa'i
216a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyis sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// 'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas nyan thos su 'du bar sems gnas so// zhe sdang dang bral ba la
216a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems gnas so// gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so// gzugs la dmigs nas
216a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sgra la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya ba sems gnas so// dril dmigs nas
216b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so// rol dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar
216b2(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so// reg bya la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// chos la dmigs nas de bzhin
216b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sbyin pa la dmigs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so// tshul khrims/ 
216b4(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dar sems gnas so// bzod pa la dmigs nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / gser gyi mdog tu 'dug
216b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lpags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// brtson 'grus la dmigs nas sems can thams cadabasgral bar sems gnas so// bsam gtan la
216b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so// shes rab la dmigs nas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun gcod
216b7(dkon brtsegs): par sems gnas so// byams pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnaso// snying rje la dmigs nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung
216b8(dkon brtsegs): bar sems gnas so// dga' ba la dmigs nas chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems gnas so// btang snyoms la dmigs nas sems can rjes su chags pa dang / 
217a1(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba spong ba la spyad par sems gnas so// bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so// 
217a2(dkon brtsegs): ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so// 
217a3(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang nges pa la sems gnas so// le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems gnas so// 
217a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas chags pa med pa'i
217a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so// 
217a6(dkon brtsegs): yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so// ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang mi khom par smras pa'i sems can thams cad
217a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskyab par sems gnas so// lha yid la byas nas 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so// mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar sems gnas so// 
217a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems gnas so// chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas slob dpon chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems
217b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnas so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas btang ba thams cad yongs su btang
217b2(dkon brtsegs): bar sems gnas so// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yod la byas nas smon pa dang / bsam gtan dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// 
217b3(dkon brtsegs): lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas lha thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnas so// lus yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par
217b4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar sems gnas so// ngag yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sems yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems
217b5(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus byas la dmi gas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus ma byas
217b6(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongasasu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi
217b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'o// chos thams cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar
217b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas las skye ba ni skye ba ji
218a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do// ni ba'i grogs de bzhin du byang chung sems dpa
218a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do// ni bo blo gas 'di lta steng per na gzugs gang
218a3(dkon brtsegs): ci yang rung ste thams cad ni 'byung ba tshon pa bani las gyur po'o// ni ba'i blo gros de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dngogs pa gang ci yang rung ste thams
218a4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// // zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang debyas pa migs bde dag las byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa/ 
218a5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang / le lo can de dag las
218a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag glen pa dang / rmongs pa de dag
218a7(dkon brtsegs): las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de
218a8(dkon brtsegs): dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// 
218b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag bsngags pa brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi
218b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o// sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / 
218b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang / dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o// sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag
218b4(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes su bsrung ba'i blo skye'o// sems
218b5(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang gdams pa'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag zur tsam
218b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zab mo 'i btam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o// / 
218b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag bkri dgos pa de dag la byang chub sems dpas go rims su phab ste brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par
218b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang dag zhi gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// 
219a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshul khrims la chags pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag thos pa
219a2(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag
219a3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi
219a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag gti mug chu ba de dag la thos pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o//  gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam
219a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'o// gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byam sa pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag gti mugagis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod
219a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// sems can gang dag cha mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste mi sdug pa'i gtam dang / byams pa'i gtam dang / 
219a7(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag rjes su 'thun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i sems
219a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la dben pa'i gtam gyis rjes su 'thun par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
219b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag smra dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag rgyun mi 'chang bar bstan pas 'dul
219b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la rtag par rgyun du bstan par bya'o// dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par mi bya'o// gong dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa
219b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa gtan la bab pa bstan pa dang / dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag pab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang / 
219b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i da gtam brjod par bya'o// lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// rnam par
219b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can smon lam la spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phung po la/ 
219b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye mched la gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta
219b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'o gtam brjod par bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams
219b8(dkon brtsegs): cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sdug bsngal gyis
220a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnams la 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa
220a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o// lngas 'dul ba rnams la cig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga'i ba med pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam
220a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang / de'i bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung
220a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// spyod pa la
220a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phyir mi/ ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
220a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang
220a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'bras bu yod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
220a8(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang / shes rab yongasu dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa yin/ legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no// 
220b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyan mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// dmigs
220b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khor de'i ning nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gsang ba pa'i
220b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag ni rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de byang / 
220b4(dkon brtsegs): chub thob pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam/ mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub
220b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de
220b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan pa kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste
220b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / brtsod ka dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams
220b8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
221a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pa'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad par
221a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don nus pa/ 'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra// zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par bzhugs// nyi ma lta bu mun
221a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'joms mdzad pa// mi mchog ci'i slang du 'dzum pa bstan// mos pa ni gnas rdzing du rab tu zhugs// zugs rje'i chu ba brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'khrungs// dran pas kha
221a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan drinam ldan// bad ga shegs pa \u0f7f sma dadzum pa mdzad// dran pa 'i nod bci zhi gnas sade lags te// snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sa
221a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// shes rab mar mas mun pas la mdzadapa/ bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa/ 
221a6(dkon brtsegs): rab ribasal ba sred pa skam mdzad pa// 'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni sbyong mdzad pa// bde gshegs nyi ma ci slang 'dzum pa mdzad// khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ 
221a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na'ang lhang nge ba// drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams lta// mi mchog ci slad 'dir ni 'dzum pa mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
221a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nga'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i blo gros gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje thogs nas
221b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de/ 
221b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de skal ba bzang
221b3(dkon brtsegs): po de 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams
221b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba der skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag brgya brgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' di dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur/ don
221b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshul la yang 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du yang bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin/ gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mnyes par byed par/ 
221b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ bsti bstang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi gan na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ 
221b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de de'i
221b8(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
222a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur te/ skal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs
222a2(dkon brtsegs): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa 'de bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ba skyes bu 'dul ga kha lo bsgyur ba blan med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi stong pa/ 
222a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rte du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi
222a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de ni 'byor dpa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang // nyams dga' ba dang / lha dang mi mang pos gang
222a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa gang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang
222a6(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / byi ru dang spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de mig mang ris su byas pa
222a7(dkon brtsegs): lag 'thil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ka tsa la ni di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgrengs pas
222a8(dkon brtsegs): legs par brgyan pa lha'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog gi khebs par byas pa spos kyi snying po dam pas legs par 'dugs pa steng gi bar snang la lha'i
222b1(dkon brtsegs): rim mar sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na so dang mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i yongs su spyad
222b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'dra ba dang / yid la bsams pas zas dang / skom dang bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal mad khang dang gos dang rgyun grub cing legs par rgyan
222b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po lamos par 'gyur te
222b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa skye sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams doni 'di la ste nyan thos kyi tshig pa ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rung ste thegs
222b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'angan/ ga gsung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga shegs pa
222b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa'am/ 'tshong nyams
222b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ tshul khrims nyams pa'am lta ba nyams par mi 'gyur ro// nar ba'am/ zeng ba'am/ skur ba'am/ gtu ma nga'am/ dag pa'am
222b8(dkon brtsegs): mi thun pa'am/ glo ba nams/ lkug pa'am thum pa'am/ dbang po mtshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lhadang mod dag thams cad kying mtshan ci shun brgyad sa
223a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi skal pa brgyad thung bar 'gyur ro// lnga dang mi rnams kyang blo bur du
223a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'od dang gzhan yang mang du yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
223a3(dkon brtsegs): de nam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sku las 'od phyung ba dang / de nas sems can de dag gis 'od de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par
223a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyis bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dod dngo snyam mo// de na kha cig ni mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// kha cig
223a5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// der lha dang ma di dag 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi bar snang la shing ta la 'bum
223a6(dkon brtsegs): srid du mngon par 'phags te/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs nas/ skus khyab par mdzad ste sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa
223a7(dkon brtsegs): tshom par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston
223a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa dang 'gal bar byed pa 'am/ bzlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do// sems can de dag
223b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni dbang po rno ba mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan
223b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na dade'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med
223b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'am mir gyur pa de'i mdun du
223b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye b.raganas pa dang der lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa des / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas 'di snyam
223b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las ban sa gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid la bsams pas
223b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams su bstan pa dang zas dang skom dang / ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs chod bab ces gsol pa dang / der de
223b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo// bshos gsol nas slar bzhud par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na
223b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang
224a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes byag// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdon lu bsnun
224a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bor shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo// de dag
224a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa der bskye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// 
224a4(dkon brtsegs): denas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te
224a5(dkon brtsegs): rdorje de na mkha'i dkyil du 'phangs so// rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// me tog
224a6(dkon brtsegs): gi char yang phab bo// rol mo'i sil snyan brgya'i sgra yang byung ngo // 'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag byung ngo // de nas gsang ba
224a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zad chos kyi mdzod// chos rnams rab tu 'byed la/ 
224a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa 'gro don bzhed// chos la thugs ma zhum zhing rtag tu lhug par btang // chos kyi rjes mthun chos bsgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye
224b1(dkon brtsegs): shes spyong rnam dag/ yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags// ye shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bsam ma 'tshal// chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs
224b2(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag/ nyi ma las lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog/ tshangs pa las lhag gsung
224b3(dkon brtsegs): snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba// dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sku yang ston la sku dang ldan ma lags// khyod ni gsung yang brjod la sgra
224b4(dkon brtsegs): skad rtog mi mnga'// khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral// sems can thar par mdzadal sems can 'du shes bral// khyod ni gang dag chos
224b5(dkon brtsegs): ston thos nas ji lta bstan pa ltar// bsgrub pa snying po snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs par// 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni// khyod
224b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bka' drin lan ldon nam yang rngo mi thog/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi
224b7(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro// me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
224b8(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan par gyur cing mig mangs ris su gnas par kun du snang ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes
225a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpal ni ba'i blogros kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po gan rdom
225a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mod/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pas bdag
225a3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan to// smras pa ci zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod lung bstan/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thob par byang med par lung bstan pathob bo// smras pa/ ci zhig/ 
225a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa med/ smras pa/ sems can dang srog dang / gang zag dang / gso ba dang / skyesadabu thob pa med do// phung po rnams dang / khams
225a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / skye mched rnams thob pa med do// dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa
225a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 
225a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob pa med do// smras pa/ gal te thob pa med na/ 'dir ci zhig lung ston/ smras pa mi dmigs
225a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes lung bstan to// smras pa ye shes gang lung bstan smras pa/ gang gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba'o// smras pa/ gal te/ 
225b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur na lung bstan bathob par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir lce gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dan
225b2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gal te ye shes gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba yin na lung ston pa ni su zhig/ lung ni sul ston/ smras pa lung ston pa gang yin pa dang / 
225b3(dkon brtsegs): su la lung ston pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o// smras pa gsang ba ba'i bdag po gnyis su med pa'i mtha' gang yin/ 
225b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la lung bstan du ci yod/ smras pa/ mtha' gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ste mtha' de nyid du lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gang la gnas na
225b5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang min/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi mtha' dang srog dang gang zag na
225b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtsha
225b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas
225b8(dkon brtsegs): ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i srid pa'i mtha'i gnas so// smras pa/ ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i mitha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ shin du ma skyes
226a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba'i mtha'i gnas so// smras pa ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin/ smras pa rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha'
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas so// smras pa/ rnam par rig pas ci zhig rig par byed/ smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par byed na/ rnam par rig pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 
226a3(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa thams cad rnam par rig par mi byed do// smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes par
226a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ smras pa/ gal te kun shes par byed na rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do// 
226a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa gang gi tshe rnam par rig pa khas mi len pa'o// smras pa ji ltar na rnam par rig pa
226a6(dkon brtsegs): khas mi len smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug pa'o// smras pa/ ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug/ smras pa gang gi tshe don la
226a7(dkon brtsegs): rton pa'o// smras pa/ don la rton pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don mi mthong ba'o// smras pa/ don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin smras pa/ 
226a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o// smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur/ smras pa
226b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi mi don dang / don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i mchos don du gnyer bar 'gyur to// smras pa gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na don tu gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam/ 
226b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos don du gnyer ba ni ci yang don du gnyer ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni chos ma yin te chos su mi rung ngo // 
226b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ chos gang yin/ smras pa/ gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa'o// smras pa/ gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pade la chos gang yin/ smras pa
226b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang la yi ge rnams kun du mi 'byung ba de nyid chos de yin no// de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med deb sgra med pa brjod pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu su zhig
226b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag smra'o zhes smras pa de 'chal par smra ba'o// gang / 'chal par smra ba de la chos med do// 'dul ba med/ do// smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang
226b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gsung ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal bar gsung bar mi 'gyur ram smras pa zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs so// ma brjod do/ 
226b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/ de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigs so// smras pa/ smras na nyes pa ci
226b8(dkon brtsegs): yod/ smras pa ngag gi las kyi nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ngag gi las las nyes pa ci zhig 'byung / smras pa/ yi ge la sems pas bklags
227a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ nyes pa med pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang mi smra mi brjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do// 
227a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o// gang bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang / gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de nyes pa med pa'o// smras pa nyes
227a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/ smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa'o// smras po/ 'dzin pa'i rtsa bci yin/ smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o// smras pa
227a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/ smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ni rtsa ba'o//  smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa'i
227a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ci yin/ smras pa/ lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ban rtsi ba'o// smras pa/ ci zhig la lhag par/ dmigs smras pa/ gzugs rnams dang
227a6(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams la lhag par dmigs so// smras pa/ lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu
227a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa gal te sred pa'i bag la nyal la lhag par mi dmigs pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de lta bas na sred pa la dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to// 
227a8(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgyani mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
227b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par lung
227b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste/ chom zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas bac+doMs pa 'di skad ces gsol to// c+doMs bdag la thugs brje bar dgongs
227b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs gcig/ nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho drang 'khor dugashegs shing dgung bdun zhig bcug
227b4(dkon brtsegs): par ci ga nang de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho drang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang grul bum dang srin po dang sha zad
227b5(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis te sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa de dgagis bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na yun ring / 
227b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i don dang sman pa dang bde ba dang grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so// de nas yang khro ba dang ldang ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
227b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde ba dang grub pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
227b8(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse ba dang / sems can tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongasu bskang pa'i phyir byang chub sems
228a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa'i bdag par gnas srung ma can gyi po brang 'khor du
228a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs te zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad par rig nas tshim ning mgul
228a3(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
228a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ba/ la der song ste/ rang gi gnas su phyin to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsam/ 
228a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mchod pa'i las kyi phyir ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems
228a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
228a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po byas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo de nas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis mngon par shes te dus gcig cig na bcom
228a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam
228b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs logs sa sangs rgyas kyi nang ng+gA'i klung gi byer skyed 'angs te/ 
228b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha dang mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das
228b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bkod pa mthong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams
228b4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 
228b5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' ya kod/ 
228b6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi dbus na gnas par bsnang ngo // 'khor gyi khyams de yang yangs shing rgya che ste shar
228b7(dkon brtsegs): nub tu chur ni dpag tshad drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod pa lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ sa bzhi ni bai DUr+ya sngon po'i rang bzhin du gnas paphyir ni and
228b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyil las byas pa zung gi phrugs rin po che thams cad kyis spros pa/ 'dzam bu cho bo'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i brgyan pa rgyan phreng sna tshogs du mas spras pa ras bcos
229a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dum bting ba mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma dbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi dums mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng bdums bkab pa/ 'og
229a2(dkon brtsegs): bor du ma nas gdugs pa lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang kha dog sna tshogs bkram po bkra ba lta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lus sim par byed pa/ sems dga' ba bskyed pa
229a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa bsngags pa'i tshogs bstan pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsabs brgyan pa/ rin po che'i
229a4(dkon brtsegs): kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dadang ldan pa mu tig gi dri bas g.yogs pa mig dmangs ris su bris pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu dum
229a5(dkon brtsegs): bting ba steng du rin po che'i dra bas bres pa bkod pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo // 
229a6(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas ro bro ba brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so// seng ge'i khris la mi brtan pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa sna
229a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas dran pa dang
229a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ 
229b1(dkon brtsegs): re brab mang ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsod pa mang po yang bshams nas namanangs pa dang rgyal po chen po bani la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ khabs bcom ldan
229b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang babs gcig tu gas pa parang gi gnas su sgra byas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khab la thugs bkyi
229b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir gnang gis de la byed dbyu dang bcas/ gsog lakhor dang bcas par mig yeng pa'i sems kyis dag dun kyi bar du las gzhan mi rnyed par dpozhin gshegs pa la mtshang bdang / 
229b4(dkon brtsegs): rim gro bya bar spro bar myos shig/ lung lo can gyis brabar khor na gnad sbyin dang sman po dang / yid btogs dang sha za dang
229b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba dang lto bya/ chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dga'akhod pa de dag la yang grogs po
229b6(dkon brtsegs): dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho drang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gis de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang / 
229b7(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ chos kyang nyon cig ces
229b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgo'o// / bam po brgyad pa/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa/ bzhin
230a1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ 
230a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis khyod kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sgron zhig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o// zhes te ji
230a3(dkon brtsegs): skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu des byas so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag bzangs shes bya ba la smras pa/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul
230a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis stobs kyis song las bla ba'i lha rnams nas bzung ste bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang da sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang
230a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can
230a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis khyed kyi nang nas su blta 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzangs kyis
230a7(dkon brtsegs): byas so// de nas skad gcig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis dpag tshad khri kho ra khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to// 
230a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te nam nangs pa dang pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan
230b1(dkon brtsegs): dasag da sa sbyar pa sa chags dum chis sa na sus su nga sa
230b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thus cha nas pa ga/ blangs nga/ nga bad+mag shegs sdug pags pa'i dzin pa zhes pas/ 
230b3(dkon brtsegs): byams dang sa rje'i sbyi ma / da po'i rnams pa/ rgyam sa gas// blangs brlu dru/ 
230b4(dkon brtsegs): chub yan lagam tog brtson// rnam grol 'bras bu bun ma ma tshogs// rgyal brjong ba gshegs su gsol/ shes rab rgya chen pang ba'o// 
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing // rnal 'byor pa yi tshong bas bltam// yon tan rgya mcho ga shegs su gsol// thugs rje dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa/ shes rab 'ang zer legs pa
230b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyas// slobs 'dra la 'byod pa// grub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol// las kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing // rnam thar las tshogs sman tshogs can// slob nga
231a1(dkon brtsegs): mi slob ri dgas bltam/ thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gdugs
231a2(dkon brtsegs): tsho bab par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gdugs tshong pab kyis chos gos gyon la lhung bzed thogs shing zhag bdun
231a3(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs pa rlobs la gtsug lag khang gi khang skyong bsgos shig/ de na nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar
231a4(dkon brtsegs): snang la dong ngo // gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan po ma yi/ ngan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khrod du bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan gcig tu
231a5(dkon brtsegs): namakha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyuranas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor
231a6(dkon brtsegs): zhan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu byangs len 'od zer ni 'gyed/ me tog gi char na
231a7(dkon brtsegs): 'babs rol mo si la snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen/ 
231a8(dkon brtsegs): bdang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang sangs rgyas kyichis 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi dpa' chen pa dang / sangs rgyas kyim
231b1(dkon brtsegs): brjid chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lpang lo can gyi po drang 'khor ga la bder nam kha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dang pa'i rgyal po/ 
231b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du thogs pa med par gshegs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i dkyil gyi lam nas dang ba'i rgyal
231b3(dkon brtsegs): po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga' nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang mtshungs lha'i dbang po brgya byin ltar
231b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshad ngas pa'i tshigs kyis ni bskor zhing gshegs brgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la
231b5(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das lamachod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog ud pa
231b6(dkon brtsegs): la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man d+ha ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / yongs su 'du dang / yongs 'du chen po dang / man dzu ka dang
231b7(dkon brtsegs): man 'juka chen po dang / sbal dang / sbrul chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / 
231b8(dkon brtsegs): zhim dang / pad+ma 'dab brgya dang / 'dab stong dang / skar 'od dang / skar ma dga' dang / kun du bsung dang / bsung rtag dang / rtag tu me tog chags
232a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mig tu sdug pade dag dang me tog gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gdugs dang
232a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag kyang bsgreng ngo // rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong yang len to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang
232a3(dkon brtsegs): spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang / sil snyan dang / glu
232a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len bdag dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/ byang chub
232a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun khang du bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das
232a6(dkon brtsegs): sa la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sa chen po dal zhing mi drag la sems can thams cad la mi gnod par g.yos par gyur to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lcang lo
232a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi pho drang 'khor du byon par rig nas myur ba myur bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang / byug
232a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs thog pa'i me tog dang spos dang / 
232b1(dkon brtsegs): dring ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// btsun po
232b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas btung ba dang / 
232b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la brtsams te/ 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de dag la de lta bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
232b4(dkon brtsegs): grul bum dang / srin po'i 'khor de'i nang nas srog chag sa khri nyis stong gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas bung
232b5(dkon brtsegs): med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi g.yog
232b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang yon tan mtha' yas pa bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / 
232b7(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad thogs shing sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin
232b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / lhan gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun khang ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
233a1(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyalo mtshan dang / bdan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mchod dubyas/ sams
233a2(dkon brtsegs): ril mo sna tshogs byas nos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas par ldano gcig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khyams
233a3(dkon brtsegs): sustu brims/ denas bcom ldan 'angs lad kyi khams la yi rnamapas rnasas kyimatshag nga ldan pa 'das shing ya du
233a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mo zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cadad ldan pa'i 'khor kyang destan ci rigs bdag la 'khong / 
233a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsod ba pa'i bdag po la gon rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyang ba de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed
233a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la bsu bgyis shig/ mchod pa dang rim gro gyis shig/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang // de la gang dag yid rang ba/ rnal dbya bar byed pa
233a7(dkon brtsegs): ni/  de dag bsod nams skal ba can// de dag yon tan ni chung ba min zhes bka' stsal gyis de la grogs do ga khyed kyis rjes su ying rang ba dang ldan 'dang zhalo ta
233b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'ong shig/ de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo // de mthong
233b2(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/ 'on te gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa dang
233b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
233b4(dkon brtsegs): snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che maHnga' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa
233b5(dkon brtsegs): der gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod pa rnam pa 'di/ lta bu mthong nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams 'dir byin gyis brlabs so zhes sgra thos// 
233b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sprin dang / srin po dang / yid btags dang / sha za dang / 
233b7(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos
233b8(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'dud do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang
234a1(dkon brtsegs): thams sa dang ldan par 'khor la smras pa/ khyed thams cad ldan gcig tu nus la ldan gcig du chu shog/ dza ma shams pa/ 
234a2(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pi lagan rdo rje btsun ma'i khor dang bcasaganyen gyi 'khor dang bcas/ brudang bcas
234a3(dkon brtsegs): dpung dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ rang gi la gnas gus par bsgo stang du byas te/ bza' ba bca' ba bsong pa mang po bro ba mang po dum
234a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam dpas yongs su dge ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mcho/ dang par 'os pa'i nal zas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
234a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstabs te tshim par byas so// bstabs te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed bkrus ste/ 
234a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po
234a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// lcang lo can du gshegs nas bshos
234a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
234b1(dkon brtsegs): btab pa ci nas byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnod
234b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba dang grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur
234b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khyad par gyis khyad par tu mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang nyams pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
234b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'a dngas kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa
234b5(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung / shig dang bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhugs na khyad par du mngon par
234b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags par 'gyur zhing nyams pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyod la bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag na rdo rje
234b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag 'di la
234b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de dad pa yin/ dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lta 'dod pa dang / 
235a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / ser sna med par btang ba gtong ba dang lag pa brkyang ste gtong ba la dga' ba dang
235a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin pa 'gyed pa la dga' ba dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med
235a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / som nyi med la the tshom mi za zhing yid gnyis mi zab
235a4(dkon brtsegs): yin de dkar po dang nag po'i las rnams kyi rnam par smi ngan pa chud mi za bar rig nas srog gi phyir yang mi bya dab mi byed do// de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin
235a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phram dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / tshig kyal ba dang / 
235a6(dkon brtsegs): brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa yin no// de dad par gyur nas dge sbyong ngam bram
235a7(dkon brtsegs): ze gang dag yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang / nges pa dang dge ba'i chos can dang /
