235a8(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa dang thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhib dang / ngo bzlog
235b1(dkon brtsegs): bong bar smra ning btsam bu mi smra ba dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / mi dge ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / mkhengs pa dang / mucho
235b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba ma yin pa dang / tshig ma 'tshal ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shin du mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang
235b3(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / som nyi las nges par brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / yang srid pa las brgal ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
235b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang bram ze rnam pa de lta bu la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas bsten to// bsten to// bsnyen bkur byed do// 
235b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed la dgyes par byed de des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas nas chos kyi gtam gyi yang dag par ston
235b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag par ston/ tshul
235b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ba yang dag par ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 
235b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smon pa'o// 'di ni ser sna'o// 'di ni ser sna'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims so// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smon pa'o// 'di
236a1(dkon brtsegs): ni bzod pa'o/ 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o// dri
236a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan no// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni shes rab bo// 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni 'tshal ba'i shes rab bo// 'di ni cham
236a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'o// 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'o// 
236a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di na lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa'o// 'dzi ni dag gis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'din

236a7(dkon brtsegs): byi 'o// 'dzin byab ma yin pa'o// 'di ni byas na yun ring po 'din dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang grub pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen
236a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// de nas deng / 
236b1(dkon brtsegs): snod du rung bar mkhyen nas zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i
236b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i
236b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam rab tu ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/ 'di med
236b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam bar shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming
236b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis
236b6(dkon brtsegs): sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skyab skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
236b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di
236b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang
237a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gagaskye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas/ 
237a2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas srad pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag
237a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug
237a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'odi 'gag par 'gyuraro// de la don dam par ni 'byung ba 'am 'gag pa'i chos gang yang medad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
237a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pabyed pa po med pa tshor ba po med pa rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o// 'di la
237a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du gti mug pas khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/ 
237a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du
237a8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med do// gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug pa med ldog pa med
237b1(dkon brtsegs): do zhes brjod par bya'o// de chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do// the tshom mi za'o// chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi
237b2(dkon brtsegs): chags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// de mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi
237b3(dkon brtsegs): chags so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// chos thams cad kyang rang
237b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis stong pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi sa dben par yid ches so// grogs po dag de daltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas
237b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de gang
237b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan
237b7(dkon brtsegs): sngar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// 
237b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro// chung ma dang bu dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / 
238a1(dkon brtsegs): no shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongasu spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ba te den chod gzhon nur rnam par rtsed la mi dga' bas nachod
238a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur tu rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu byung nis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang
238a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsam po 'thob bo// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to// bsgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig
238a4(dkon brtsegs): lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no// mang du thos pa mo dadus su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing
238a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar/ gzhan dag/ la rgya cher yang dag par ston to// bdag gi tshig gi
238a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to// de ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dgal chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po thob bo// 
238a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed do// de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang / srog le mi lta ba yin/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang
238a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa dang / mgu sla ba dang gsosla ba dang / dgon padang / bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la yongs su
238b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa yin no// don la rton pa yin te/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba yin no// bdag 'ba' shig gi
238b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo// bag yod pa lhur len pa
238b3(dkon brtsegs): yang yin te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dbang po sdom pa'o// de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon brtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// 
238b4(dkon brtsegs): de gzugs rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang / snas dri
238b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa
238b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bag yod
238b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa la
238b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 
239a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu med pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i rgyung med pa dang / yid byas
239a2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa'i rgyub med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi chub med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// 
239a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dang pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang pa mang / 
239a4(dkon brtsegs): bdang rtag tu 'thun pa dang / chos den du gnyer ba da / chos 'dod par bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag pa dang yang nga ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol du na
239a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la/ mi 'gro'o// 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngag/ sa par 'gyur ro// gsang ba ba'i bdag po gzhan yang
239a6(dkon brtsegs): chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam la gnas so// che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo// 
239a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid tho nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bang
239a8(dkon brtsegs): po gzhan yang bde bathob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin du grub pa dang bde ba yongs su myo ngan las 'das pa la brtson par bya'o// gosang ba pa'i bdag po sngon gyi
239b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar ldang ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin du brtson par bya'o// gsang
239b2(dkon brtsegs): bapa'i bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par
239b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su bsrung ba dang / yul 'dor ba dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba la bsten pa dang
239b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam dpar rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam parartog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba rnams dang
239b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
239b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dang
239b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// 
239b8(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o// dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs
240a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba ba'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang shes
240a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin sbyor ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so// 
240a3(dkon brtsegs): gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so// de la yod pa ni gang med pa ni gang zhe na/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do// 'don yod
240a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// de la med pa gang nen/ log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ de ni med pa zhes bya'o// gnan yang las
240a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang las de dang rnam parasmin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do// gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang rno ba dang / snang
240a6(dkon brtsegs): khri dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang mi gnas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do// gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do// 
240a7(dkon brtsegs): le lo can la ni byang chub med do// phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yod do// rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do// gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug
240a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do// rtag pa brtan pa dang / ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs
240b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni med do// de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
240b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni yod do// rtag pa dang brten pa dang / ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do// gzhan yang ma
240b3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de dag ni yod do// ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de dag med do// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni
240b4(dkon brtsegs): yod do// 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyi/ sa ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do// rnam par
240b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni med do// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do// ming dang gzugs med na skye mched
240b6(dkon brtsegs): drug ces bya ba de med do// skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de med do// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni
240b7(dkon brtsegs): yid do// reg pa med na tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni med do// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// tshor ba med na sred pa zhes bya ba med do// sred pa'i rkyen gyis len
240b8(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba med do// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do// srid
241a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do// srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni med do// skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / 
241a2(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do// skye ba med na rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
241a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do// / 
241a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// tshul khri dmas kyis ngan song du skye bo ni med do// thos pas shes rab chen po 'gyur ba ni yod do// thos pas shes
241a5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do// bsgoms pas 'dra/ la bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin
241a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yid la byed pa dang ldan nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni kun
241a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa brda sprod pa med do// mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do// gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// nang gi rjesu song ba'i
241a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni med do// ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do// bdag gam sems can nam srog gam gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa
241b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni meng // gsang ba da'i bdag po de ltar na ga yod pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa
241b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so// 'jig rten namakhas pa rnams la med par grags po gang yin pa de ni meng par rab tu shes so// de yod do nas tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang
241b3(dkon brtsegs): mi chag so// med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so// gsang ba
241b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam pa dar bzhag go// bzhi gang zhe na dge sbyong dang
241b5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe rings po rtagapar 'du she pa rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du
241b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag du smra ba rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do// 
241b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang / rnam por rtog po la spyod pa mngon pa'i de rgyal can rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das ni ni ba zhes bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni
241b8(dkon brtsegs): shin du mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral po'i tshig bla dgas so// bdag med ces bya ba don stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// 
242a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa ni ni ba'o// zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad la
242a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mos shing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ni dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams ning yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi
242a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi
242a4(dkon brtsegs): po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das dbadag cag gi ji ltar 'jig rten bskyang bar bgyi de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di
242a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyongs shig/ de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// 
242a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang gzhan gyi chung ma la mi 'phyo ba dang chos spyod pa rnams
242a7(dkon brtsegs): la bden pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / tha ba'i tshig med de zher mi 'debs pa dang / tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/ gzhan mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi
242a8(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang / gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song ba ste/ grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig
242b1(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma
242b2(dkon brtsegs): la gus pa dang / thams cad du 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'o sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa
242b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/ grogs po dag chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po gan
242b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa
242b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa 'i lus kyi las kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyurar ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / 
242b6(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o// 
242b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang / yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur
242b8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom
243a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o// rnyed pa gang dag chos dang mthun pa'i chos kyis
243a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa 'am/ lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa thabs mkhas pa rnams dang lhan gcig tu rnyed pa 'thun par
243a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba
243a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi do pa'o// tshul khrims ma nyams pa skyon med pa
243a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren ma ma yin pa/ bsra bsre ma yin pa rang dbang can ma 'gags pa mkhas pas bsngags pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas po rnams kyis ma smad
243a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul khrims mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur
243a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / mgu bar byed pa dang / bla mor byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus
243a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu bo dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'i// lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges par 'byed po'i chadang 'thun pade/ 
243b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig du lta ba 'thun/ 
243b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / 
243b3(dkon brtsegs): gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste/ grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig
243b4(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang / 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 
243b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / 'jigs pa spangs pas 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti
243b6(dkon brtsegs): mug gi 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ grogs po dag 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten
243b7(dkon brtsegs): skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang na na/ 'di lta ste ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ste/ 
243b8(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten myong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig khon ste/ 'di ltaste/ bden pa ni 'jig rten srung
244a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ wa gyu med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/ grogs bdag chos gcig po na
244a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sbyang bar byed pa'o// grags padag de la dzu tshas la brtson na 'jig rten chung por byed de/ grags bdag byed kyis chos do la bu la brtson pas 'jog rten rgya ma shig/ 'dzig
244a3(dkon brtsegs): rten rlung ba'i la nu nos bya ste bcu dgrupar/ do nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs/ gas sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas la
244a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thams cad dge bdo ldan por gyur ba dang / deb phrin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gas sngags kyi tshig de dgangs 'khor 'dil
244a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// nA mnas de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsang banga'i bangadagi po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pongs klu'i rgyal po sogam med kyi gnas
244a6(dkon brtsegs): sugasang sngogs kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ngas sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa
244a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod kyis dran nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la
244a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cog tsog por 'dug nas lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das
244b1(dkon brtsegs): sa gnyis la gtugs te/ gsang sngags kyi tsha 'di gnas so// 'as / mthul/ rgyal ba / rgyal n+d+ha/ a rbud+na #
244b2(dkon brtsegs): / mnu ne d+d+ha/ denan / naganas sak+Sha/ gan b+h+yanas/ na nanas/ ma / mAnA d+ha
244b3(dkon brtsegs): na ma bya na/  dus su phre go/ oMt-i/ gas sngagasadatshig bstan pa' sha ben 'i gnas thams cad
244b4(dkon brtsegs): rnamams thams cad rab tugasas so// na po yang ra tu khrugs so// de nas thams cadaldan pa 'i 'khor yang 'dang ba bang nas
244b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par mdzad do// de nas thams cad da
244b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la ma reg tsam du nye bar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol/ bdeb
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab du gsol/ bdag cag la gnod lags so// bdag cag la rab tu gnod lags so// bdag cag 'dar yang pad lags so// bcom ldan
245a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gas pa/ 
245a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'dirabatu gsos pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang / khyed kyang rnam pa la gnas nas rob tu gsos pa yin no/ 
245a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems can tshad med pa de dag gis
245a4(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs par gyur pa de ltar chosacher bston to// // bam po dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
245a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i drirdo rje'i rdzas bcom ldan 'das la rin po che 'dra bas mngon par bkab nasabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
245a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
245a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na
245a8(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba med pa'i byams pa chen po dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po dang / bya ba thams cad nyams rig tu chud pe'i byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor
245b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum du yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang
245b2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa mthong ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste
245b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' tshos bcu po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes
245b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs da rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi
245b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis
245b6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa nyid thos nas mi dngang mi skrag par mi 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis brtan pa yin/ ye shes kyis brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyan
245b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin/ sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges par 'byung ba yin/ chos la mi rtag par mos pa yin/ 
245b8(dkon brtsegs): sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po
246a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa
246a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na bgyi ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub
246a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos pani dang ldanan bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/ bzhi gang zhen legs par bsgoms shing nyams par mgyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang
246a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo yongs su bsgoms dpa'i bsam gtan pa ni dang ldan pa yin/ tshangs pa'i bla dam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bani dang / 
246a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyi rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thad/ sa dang shes rab las nges par 'byung ba yin te/ gnon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
246a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar
246a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal po/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bani gang ne na 'od lta ste/ sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo
246a8(dkon brtsegs): tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan po shes rab kyi sgo dang / skad thams cad kun du 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad pa bstan pas sa yang dag par rig pa'i smra/ 
246b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis bcom ldan
246b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/ dgu ga zhin/ snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang
246b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i stobs dang // 
246b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs dang sems can bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang bdud tshar bcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / 
246b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i/ stobs dang stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par/ bya ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gzhon nu
246b6(dkon brtsegs): dgu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag bzod
246b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / 
246b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad dun 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing cim
247a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba bta/ 
247a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang
247a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcang par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bskul gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba/ 
247a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bdud kyi snga 'ongs pa na bdud tshar bcad pa'i phyir dngas khyod kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag bsam shing brjod pa dang kha ngon byas pa de dag la khyod spabs/ 
247a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ 
247a6(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// tad ya thA
247a7(dkon brtsegs): hu lu hu lu/ hU la d+hi re/ hA rI tI/ a ku sha lak+Sha ye/ tsa la tsa la ba ti/ sA re/ kU re/ kAn ti ba le/ k+She me/ shan ti ka re/ kA me/ sham/ hu lu/ a
247a8(dkon brtsegs): l-i khi/ khi ri khi ri/ A be sha na si ra Ne/ dza ye dza ya ba ti/ s+thi re a brte/ bi bat+te/ a brta ni/ mA ti/ b+hU tA nAn/ sang dra he da mi/ dmas ma pan ne rti ne/ tar yas/ 
247b1(dkon brtsegs): sra yan/ swasti depe byo/ nA ge d+yo/ yak+She byo/ gan d+harba rA kA se b+h+yo/ ma nuShe/ a ma nu She b+h+ya swastir b+ha ba tu sra drA su kham/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/ ri yi rgyal pa/ 
247b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang g.yos// sa yang rab tu g.yos 'gyur// chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrugs// gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// phas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod// chos
247b3(dkon brtsegs): smra ba ni yang dag bsdus// chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs// gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni// lha tshogs kun du dgar gyur nas// dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes// 
247b4(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos// 'khor kyang rab tu 'dar gyur nas// mi yi dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la// gtugs par byas te skyabs
247b5(dkon brtsegs): dong // de dag mi 'jigs der phyin nas// ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to// mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs bas na// dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur// de nas
247b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag bdun 'das nas su sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas zhag bdun 'das te/ lcang lo can gyi po drang 'jor
247b7(dkon brtsegs): du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/ na mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub
247b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod gnod sbyin dang / 
248a1(dkon brtsegs): dI za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnamakha' lding du mas ni bskor/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par rjong/ 
248a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/ rol mo'i sil snyan ni len me tog gi char ni'i bebs/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas/ 
248a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen/ 
248a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/ slar bya rgod kyi
248a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ri la byon to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ya nga bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to// bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// 
248a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus
248a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma skyes dag 'khor dang bcas pas
248a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thogasate/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
248b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rigal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
248b2(dkon brtsegs): go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na mdun khang na mchis na gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis
248b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ de skad ces mchi'o// yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs shes gda'o zhes mchis
248b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ gang gi slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs
248b5(dkon brtsegs): na yang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas 'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i
248b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na gang yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
248b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan
248b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/ 
249a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba
249a2(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
249a3(dkon brtsegs): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur
249a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul da gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te de dag gi dgan nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas des na spobs pa 'di lta bu
249a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das po'i dus na skal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches
249a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa/ rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/ tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i skal ba la 'jig rten khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya bar/ 
249a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi
249a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par ni spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par ni spyod de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis
249b1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'bara' shig yang dag par ston pa rgyal po chen po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stobs she/ 
249b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ 
249b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
249b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam du bdag
249b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams/ pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/ 
249b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags te/ 
249b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
249b8(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches bde'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la
250a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa de lta de ltar bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las/ 
250a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das na slad kyis ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyis te/ mya ngan las
250a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing sems can gyi don la brtson pa ni sangs rgyas bcom
250a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos tshad ma dmachis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchi/ das pa yongs su smin par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang
250a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du
250a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ni btang snyoms su ltung lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyi sems
250a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i spyod yul ma
250a8(dkon brtsegs): lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'tshal zhing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid la g.yel ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
250b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams/ 
250b2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems
250b3(dkon brtsegs): dpas rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o// rgyal po chen pos de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces
250b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs da par smras pa leg so legs so// byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par bya ste/ 
250b5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i gzhan gyi spyod yul la spyad par mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang lags/ 
250b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul 'di lta ste 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang / 
250b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi so la 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la khams gsum du yang mtshams sbyor ba dang / sel ba dang sdud pa dang / dge
250b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang / zad pa yang shes la bsod nams kyi/ 
251a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mi zad pa la yang mkhas pa dang / skye ba med par yang rab tu rtog pa la bsams bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sems can yang med pa/ 
251a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad dben par yang shes la dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
251a3(dkon brtsegs): na mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par shes la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam
251a4(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang
251a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyong/ la don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / sems can tha mas cad kyi ci bya'o cog la yang mkhas la lus dang sems dben
251a6(dkon brtsegs): par dga' ba yang shes pa dang / chos bstan pa yang ma 'dor la smra ba la smad pa la mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan yang bskyed la bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar yang mi byed pa dang / chos zab mo rtog/ 
251a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang shes la sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su yang 'jug cing gtam yang dag par ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'byung ba med par yang shes la bsams bzhin du srid pa
251a8(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lhag mthong yang shes la 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la de bzhin gsheg
251b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi yul la blta ba la yang mkhas pa ste
251b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo// rgyal po chen po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stobs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
251b3(dkon brtsegs): par zhi spyod las spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
251b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan dpa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal
251b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bdag sems pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
251b6(dkon brtsegs): ste dper bgyi na gnas lags pa dang / gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang / na mkha'i spyod yul la sgrib pa ma mchis pas gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam
251b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i spyod yul lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabs byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so// 
251b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyid na gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni na mkha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug gi shing ljon pa 'am/ sman gyi shing
252a1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa 'am/ tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa 'am/ me tog gi shing ljon pa'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'am/ spos kyi shing ljon pa gang
252a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de dag thams cad ni na mkha' las rnam par 'phel yang na mkha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag par yang mi 'gyur/ rjes chags par yang
252a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos
252a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lags te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos gang dag la dgas pa dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slo dab pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang
252a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni des mngon par
252a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi ni zhugs ni rtsa'am nags tshal gang yang rung ste de la mi 'bros kyi de dag thams cad ni mi sgron gsal bar 'bar bar
252a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pas phan par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi ma sgron 'bar bar bgyid pas chos thams ca ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ba lags so// 
252a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na tshan po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis mi 'tshig mtshon gyis mi khums dug gis mi 'gum ste/ de la pha rol gyis gnod pas mi tshug so// / 
252b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang ye shes dang / nyan thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / nyon
252b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro// 
252b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rin
252b4(dkon brtsegs): po che yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug
252b5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig du'ang mi gnas la dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyi do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa yang sams
252b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi nyon mongs pa'am/ rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas shing sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
252b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'dis na chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyis de skad bstan pa na srog chags brgya stong gis
252b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du
253a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par ni spyod kyi gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur pa
253a2(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur to/ rgyal po
253a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu bgos so// de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas so// dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
253a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// / de nas rgyal po/ dam skyes dag 'di snyam du sems te gsang ba pa'i bdag dpo lag na rdo rje lag pa g.yA pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gas/ 
253a5(dkon brtsegs): 'on te yang ba zhig/ gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs chen po bdog pa zhes bya snyam mo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
253a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyi shes nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci ba yang yin la yang ba yang yin no// smras pa/ 
253a7(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir na lci ba yin la/ ji ltar na yang ba yang yin/ smras pa rgyal po chen po sems can nga rgyal can dang / rgyags pa dang dregs pa bsnyems pa rnams yongs su gdul ba'i phyir lci ba yino// / 
253a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can nga rgyal med pa dang / drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa phyog de rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / 
253b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dag 'a di skad ces smras so// 
253b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgas chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pas/ rdo rje stobs kyi shugs thams
253b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis bteg par bskyod na/ skra'i rtse mo cha tsam yang bskyod pa'am bskul ba ma nus nas de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
253b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chen po chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang ya lang bskon pa'i glang po che yang lag pa ya gcig gis bdeg pa'i rngo thog na bdag gis
253b5(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa'am bskul ba'i rdo yang ma thog na bdeg par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis
253b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di lcis 'di la khyod yim chad cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka
253b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / stobs
253b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi shugs thams cad bstan kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa 'am bskul bar ma nus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
254a1(dkon brtsegs): n+d+ha dru rgyamatshig yang 'dzin pa gas bdagagis da su du ts+tsha sprul ma 'das ldan lagasas
254a2(dkon brtsegs): la ga sabacom ldan das kyis paka' stsal pa na gyi ngal dun rgyas rnangs pa mtshan pa tshan par ga/ rkyen gang ma du
254a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ka'aphrul pa/ kA r+sa kA na / kA rbashrIgag gas pa'i dag pa zhin pa na kyi chug
254a4(dkon brtsegs): // ma rjo jug kyi na sa sa du ga pa mig dzi ngas
254b1(dkon brtsegs): par ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de la bzung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug
254b2(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos rab tu g.yos te/ chu yang gnam du brgal zhing rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje bskyod pa'am bskul bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du
254b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i
254b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar dbang che bar grags la de ltar mthu che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
254b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthi la gcig tu 'jog go/ bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang dper bgyi na mi
254b6(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis dkar sha pa ni gcig 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sgra bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis sgra bzlog go// bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mchi ba yang bdag gi
254b7(dkon brtsegs): thogs par bgyid do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya cig gis blangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gos klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo de
254b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyang btul to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du yang mchis bdag gis ri rab tsam gyis kham de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/ bcom ldan
255a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyed pa'am bsgral ba'i rdo yang mthog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag rngu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs sunyams pa
255a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyis byang chub sems
255a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs 'di nyan thos dung rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par daklog par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lnga smos kyang ci dgos mo ru
255a4(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na da ri'i rgyal po ri rib yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa'am bskul dbar nus kyi rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa'am bsgral
255a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgol gyi bu chen bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltarardo rje 'odi 'chang bas gsong ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni spong
255a6(dkon brtsegs): che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rir ba ji snyed yod pa de dag ri gcig tu gyur kyang don bdag par/ 
255a7(dkon brtsegs): nus kyi rdo rje 'di ni bdag par mi nus so// de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
255a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gsang ba pa'i
255b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs te pa ma las gyur pa lags sam/ 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bung ma las
255b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yang rung ste 'jug pa tsam ming bstan par zad do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa
255b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten me myo por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi glang po che'i lta bsngangs kyis phyogs thams cad kun du gzigs te/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
255b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas thag cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag dbo lag na rdo rje de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
255b5(dkon brtsegs): khams g.yos par byas nas sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te steng gi bar snang du 'phangs nas des de bsnang la lan bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas par bzhag go// de nas
255b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdorje
255b7(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sems can kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma
255b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
256a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob ste/ bcug nen/ rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub mas dpa'alus
256a2(dkon brtsegs): dang srog yongs su gtong gi dam pa'i chos ni yongs su ma gtong ba dang sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / sems can mthu chung ba rnams la
256a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa dang / sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs po sbyin pa dang / 
256a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bar bya bar spro/ dab dang / sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa dang / de bzhin
256a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rdo thal gyis skud pa dang sems can rnams la kun du dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig sgrogs pa dang sems can dbul po sdug
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba ngal ba chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob bo/ gsol ba bcom ldan
256a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cod shes pa gnas shing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba rgyal po chen po byang chub
256a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ste brgyad gang zhen 'di lta ste/ bka' dro bad ba dang
256b1(dkon brtsegs): drang ba dang gnyen pa dang / des pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / sems las su rung ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang
256b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes
256b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'gro ba ni du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 
256b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe mo'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i tshe/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / lha'i
256b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byu nga ba mnyes par byed pa dang mi mjed kyi bad ga po tshangs par 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung / 
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyes par byed pa dang / khyim bdag tshong dpon du gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
256b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dad pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyal
256b8(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dad pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu
257a1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa ni longs spyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po thos pa'i rgyu
257a2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa ni shes rab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad
257a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni sems can rje su bsrung ba'o// 
257a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi rgyu mthun pa ni da lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da brtson 'grus kyi rgyu ma thun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
257a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsam gtan gyi rgyu
257a6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad
257a7(dkon brtsegs): sel ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni the tsom spong ba'o// gsol pa/ 
257a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos yong su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ni somanya med pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
257b1(dkon brtsegs): dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
257b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'bral ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags
257b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni yongs su 'dzin par 'dor ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'/ 
257b4(dkon brtsegs): srul pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni nye dbar len pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom lnga den 'das bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'
257b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ning 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni ba zos pa'i rgyu mthun
257b6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'
257b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus dang / sems dben pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ 
257b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lus dang sems dben pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'
258a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal ba rgyal po chen po lam gyi rgyu mthun pa ni 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka
258a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'
258a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu mthun pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bu lags
258a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom da ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta bu lags/ bka'
258a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po snying rje chen po bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba su'i legs/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
258a6(dkon brtsegs): po su dad pa bskyed pa'i'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa bskyed pa su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom
258a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su
258a8(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par mi 'khrugs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen posu snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji ltar sems can rnams la yongs su mi gtong ba bskyed pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sems can rnams
258b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi bde ba yongs su gtong ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba gtong ba ji lta bu lags/ 
258b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba su lags/ bka'
258b4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ rgyal po chen po su nyon mongs pa thams cad yo dngas su gtong ba de dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong rab yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dag
258b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par gsungs pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par bcas
258b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa rje su mthun pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chab mi 'tshal ba dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa ma mchis pa dang / las
258b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bya ba la 'jug pa bstan pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang / mi sla ba'i mtshan nyid legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar
258b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dag ma gtogs par 'di ltar che zhing 'di ltar gya nom pa'i
259a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la brtson pa rnams la su zhig bzlog par bgyid gnod par bstid spong bar bcad bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge
259a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byas pa mi bzo bar mi 'gyi'o// gang gi mthus bdag nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad las rnam par log pa 'o bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis sha dang / 
259a3(dkon brtsegs): khrag gis kyang bka' drin glan pa'i rngo ma thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus bdag gis bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang chos snang ba chen po thob
259a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyis pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bdag gis lan glan pa'i rngo mi thog lags so// tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' dag
259a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo // zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o// ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i le'u
259a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / bam po bcu pa ste tha ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam
259a8(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di kho bo'i dbang yin te/ zhi bo'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
259b1(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig sprul na/ kho bo'i sprul pa gzugs tha dad pa/ rnam par brtson pa tha dad pa yang de snyed de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ ni ba'i blo gros 'di ni sngon gyings yongs su dag
259b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya
259b3(dkon brtsegs): pa tha mal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar de bzhin
259b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shog/ gsang ba pa de'i bdag pos smras pa rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab
259b5(dkon brtsegs): zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge gang dag gi sa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsnyad pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma skyes pa zad par mi 'gyur ba nub par mi 'gyur ba'o// 
259b6(dkon brtsegs): yi ge gang dag gis don gang brjod pa'i don de yang nub par bya bar mi nus pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni nub par 'gru ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
259b7(dkon brtsegs): del skye ba ci yang med do// gang la skye ba med pa de ni mi 'gag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung
259b8(dkon brtsegs): mabyung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin 'di ni 'dug pa nyid
260a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba yin no// gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / mi gal bde
260a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yin no// dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de brtag par mi nus te ngas na dam pa'i chos shes bya'o// ni ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs/ 
260a3(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag gang du go cha gyon smras pa/ gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag ni chos thams cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no// 
260a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhen gang chos thams cad dang mi 'gal/ bde nyid dam pa'i chos so// smras pa/ ji ltar na chos dang 'gal ba yin/ spros pa/ yi ge
260a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/ chos dang ni nam yang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro// de la gang dag mi 'gal ba de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// 
260a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros yod de/ 
260a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin la da ni stong pa nyid du smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten
260a8(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag po dang bde ba dang bdag dang / bdag gir smra ba yin la/ de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bdag dang bdag
260b1(dkon brtsegs): gi med par smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la/ de ni rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro bas des na de 'jig rten thams cad
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni tshe 'di lhur len pa yin la de ni tshe rabs 'pho ba lhur len pa yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni phung po dang khams
260b3(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la de ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ des na 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// zhi ba'i
260b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rnam grangs 'dis na gang dag 'jig rten tham das cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin to// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam
260b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin tam smras pa rigs kyi bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bdag yod sa su mi 'dzin sems can yongs su mi 'dzin
260b6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su mi 'dzin to// smras pa/ ji ltar yongs su mi 'dzin smras pa/ bdag dben pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / bdag
260b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can dang chos dben pa ma yin pa dang / 'das pa dben pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba dben pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
260b8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa ma yin/ 
261a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ning dben pa dang / zhing dben pa ma yin pa dang / chos dben dang chos dben pa ma yin par gang de ltar chos rnams rjes rtog/ 
261a2(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa tshas yongs su 'dzin par// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gas papa'i dag pa lagan rje la legs sa nas pa badzin/ skyes bungam pa legs sa legs
261a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gang
261a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la mtshan dang spros par mi 'dzin pa dang / kun du spyod pa med pa dang / gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// 
261a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal po bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur po des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsoto// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi
261a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' lags so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/ nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi dka'o// bcom ldan 'das de la
261a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye bar zhi ba lags te/ de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags mched pa ma lags 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lags so// gang
261a8(dkon brtsegs): dag zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba de ltar
261b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin no// lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas dge slong stong ni sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis
261b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu spobs pa 'di su'i yin/ smras pa/ spobs pa 'di ni su bag chags thams cad spangs pa dang / tshig gi lam thams cad
261b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / don dam pa brjod du med pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu spobs pa ji ltar skye/ smras pa/ spobs pa
261b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / spobs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyid dmatshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir/ spobs pa ma yin pa zhes
261b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni spobs pa med pa'i tshig go// rigs kyi bu 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la 'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / 
261b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su dmigs pa la yang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la yang mi gnas pa
261b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su chos thams cad la yang she ba mi 'jug la de shes pas chos gang yang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su gnas pa med pa dang / len pa
261b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / chu bo las brgal ba de'i spobs pa'o// 'di na skye ba med pa la skyes pa dang / 'gog pa med la mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba'i spobs pa'o// de nas
262a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rgyal po bzang po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar
262a2(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
262a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyan par 'dod nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' nas 'dir 'ongs so// zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'dis ni chos
262a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs rje su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/ de 'dod na skal pa brgya stong du thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas bstan kyang 'di'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang gi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
262a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni
