338b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po rdzu 'phrul la dbang thob pa de 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon zhag gcig gis bgrang ba de lta bu'i rnam pa rdzu 'phrul/ 
339a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yod par gyur la de dag las gzhan mi byed par lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
339a2(dkon brtsegs): med kyi nyan thos dang po 'dus pa bgrangs kyang de dag gis brgya'i char yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur te/ stong dang brgya stong dang cha dang dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur ro// kun
339a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na brgya mtsho chen po zab su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa khyon dpag tu med pa la mi la la zhig gis skra tshal ba brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu thigs
339a4(dkon brtsegs): pab gcig blangs na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems gang skra tshal pa brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i tha dgas pa gcig blangs pa dang / gang brgya mtsho chen
339a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i chu'i phung po phyin las pade gnyis gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tshad stong yang rgya mtsho chen po bas nyung lags na/ skra tshal pa brgyar gshegs pa'i
339a6(dkon brtsegs): rtse mos chab thigs pa gcig blangs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chu'i thigs pa gcig lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
339a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang por 'dus pa la mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di lta bu'i dge slong rnams kyis lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs te 'ang snyed gcig go zhes grangs kyis chos pa lta/ 
339a8(dkon brtsegs): bu yin no// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po phyin las pa lta bu ni grangs kyis mchod pa lta bu yin na/ nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa rnams lnga smos kyang ci dgos
339b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de ltar mtha' yas mu med de/ de ni dpag tu med do// zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
339b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ skal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ skal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ skal ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am

339b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar da ltar 'jig
339b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di ni skal ba'i grangs dang / skal pa bgrang ba'i brdar brtags pa de lta bu'i skal pa bcu lon no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi 'jig rten gyi
339b8(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba can zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa/ mod pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams
340a1(dkon brtsegs): de na sems can dmyal ba med do// dud 'gro'i skyes gnas med do// yid btags kyi yul med do// lha ma yin gyi ris med do// mi
340a2(dkon brtsegs): khom par skye ba med do// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na snang ba'i rin po che gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten na mi spyod do// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de ni spos sna tshogs
340a3(dkon brtsegs): dri rab tu zhim pa 'di ldang ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs 'byor pa'o// rin po che'i shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs sgra yid du
340a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od ba can gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// kun dga' bo rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag ni kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog du ma kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa'o// kun dag
340a5(dkon brtsegs): bo de na rin po che'i shing ljon pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta/ bu dang / gser gyi rang bzhin dag yod do// dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin dag yod do// /

340a7(dkon brtsegs): mu tog dmar po'i kha dog lta bu dang mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin dag yod do// rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dang / rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin dag yod do// kha gcig ni gser dang
340a8(dkon brtsegs): dngul dang / rin po che sna gnyis bdag yod do// gsar dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang / rin po che sna gsum dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / 
340b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bzhi padag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rin po che sna lnga pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / 
340b2(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che sna drug pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig
340b3(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun pa dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bod na gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 
340b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams gser gyi rang bzhin la rtsa rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no// dngul gyi shing ljon dpa rnams kyi rtsi ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang
340b5(dkon brtsegs): lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams dngul rgyarang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams be DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin no// bai DUR+Ya'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal
340b6(dkon brtsegs): ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// shel gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang yal ga
340b7(dkon brtsegs): dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams spug gi rang bzhin no// spug gi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / 
340b8(dkon brtsegs): lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams spug gi ring bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin no// mu tig dmar po'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba
341a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang
341a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// rdo'i snying po'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la 'bras bu rnams
341a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams gsar gyi rang bzhin la sdong po rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams
341a4(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ me tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing
341a5(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la sdong po rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams she la gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams spug gi rang bzhin
341a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams gser gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams
341a7(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin la sdong po rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams spug gi rang bzhin lo ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 
341a8(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams gser gyi rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams shel gyi rang bzhin la sdong po rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ 
341b1(dkon brtsegs): yal ga rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ me tog rnams ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams
341b2(dkon brtsegs): be DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsi ba rnams spug gi rang bzhin la sdong po rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin// lo
341b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin me tog rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig
341b4(dkon brtsegs): ni rtsa ba rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la sdong po rnams ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams gse dar gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin
341b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams spug gi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba
341b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la sdong po rnams gser gyi rang bzhin yal ga rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams shel gyi rang bzhin
341b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams skrag gi rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtse ba rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin sdong po rnams kyang
341b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
342a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ me tog rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa
342a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ni 'jam pa reg na bde ba dri zhim pa dag go// rlung
342a3(dkon brtsegs): gis bskyod na de dag las snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ mnyan pa dang / 'thun zhing mnyan pas chog mi shes pa'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing
342a4(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis gang ste/ mtha' ni rin po da che sna bdun gyi chu shing gi sdong po dang / rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng gis yongs su bskor ro// thams
342a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang gser gyi dra bas khebs pa'o// kun du rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma rnams kyis kheb so// da na pad+ma'i tshad dpag tshad phyed pa tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad kyi tshad
342a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga'i tshad tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad bcu'i bar gyi tshad ci dag kyang yod do// 
342a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i pad+ma thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo thad las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
342a8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis mngar ba bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ste/ de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos
342b1(dkon brtsegs): ston to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang phyogs mtshams rnams 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad bgrangs med dpag tu med
342b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri nag po rnams ye med de/ ri thams cad kyang rin po che'i ri sha stag go// ri'i
342b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab thams cad dang / khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po thams cad dang / mtsho chen po rnams med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun du mnyam
342b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams dga' ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe
342b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ri rab kyi ngos la gnas pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa ri rab kyi
342b6(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems 'di ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gong ma 'thab bral gyi lha rnams
342b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen nas 'og min gyi bar
342b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams gang na gnas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du bgyid pa bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
343a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rnyed par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
343a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba dang rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyi brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sus kyang mtha' 'am/ tshad rtogs pa 'am/ bsam par mi nus te/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi
343a3(dkon brtsegs): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i/ bsod nams dang ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / 
343a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'byu rang ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdog da ni de la dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom
343a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis te/ bdag ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / tha chom bsal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di
343a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo legs so legs so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
343a7(dkon brtsegs): de na chu klung rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ de na chu klung chen po kha tshon dpag tshad tsam dag kyang yod de dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga
343a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i bar dang / kha tshon dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad tsam dag kyang yod de/ zabs su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag go/ chu klung de dag thams cad kyang spos dri rab tu zhim pa
343b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi chur 'bab cing rin po che'i me tog sil ma'i tshogs dag 'bab pa dag go// sgra dbyangs snyan pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag go// kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag
343b2(dkon brtsegs): las lha'i glu dbyangs yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sil snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa bas lhag pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ chu klung chen po de dag las rnam pa 'di lta
343b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang / kun du shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / brjod pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par bde ba dang / snying du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar bya ba
343b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / mnyan pa dang 'thun pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / ni ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
343b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan na bde ba ste/ de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i dang khol grag go// kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag gi/ 'gram gnyis ni rin po che'i spos kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang
343b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de dag la yal ga dang lo ma dang me tog dang / dog pa sna tshogs 'phyang ngo // don sems can gang dag chu klung gi 'gram de dag tu zang zing med pa'i lha'i dga' ba dang / 
343b7(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba myong bar 'dod pa de dag chu klung de dag tu 'jug pa'i tshe/ 'dod na chu long bu nub tsam du gnas so// 'dod na chu pus mo nub tsam dang / 'dod na rked pa nub tsam dang / 'dod na mtshan
343b8(dkon brtsegs): khung nub tsam dang 'dod na med pa nub tsam du chu gnas par 'gyur te/ lha'i dga' ba dag kyang 'byung ngo // der sems can gang dag chu grang bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la
344a1(dkon brtsegs): bsil bar 'gyur ro// gang dag dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la dro bar 'gyur ro// gang dag bsil ba dang / dro bar gyur cig
344a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la chus de bsil ba dang dro bar 'gyur te bde bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po de dag ni lha'i shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a ka ru dang / dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / 
344a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya spos dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / spos mchog gis sgos pa'i chus yongs su gang ste 'bab pa/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma
344a4(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim padag gi me tog gis khebs dpa/ khol khol dag na byangang ba dang / gnang dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur ba dang / kar nad pad
344a5(dkon brtsegs): ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / rma bya la sogs pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul
344a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bya'i tshogs kyis bsten pa ngang pa dang ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa dang / 'bab stegs bde ba/ 'dab rdzab med pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal bdag go// don
344a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sems can de dag bdag cag gi bsam pa 'di 'dra ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa de lta bu dag chos dang ldan par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
344a8(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo chu de las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des sangs rgyas kyi ning der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la go bar byed do// de na sems can gang dag chu ngogs na 'khod pa dag sgra
344b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bdag cag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grag par ma gyur cig ces 'dod na de de dag gi lha'i rna ba'i dbang po la grag par mi 'gyur ro// gang sgra rnam pa ji lta bu thos par 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong
344b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thos so// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol du phyin pa'i sgra dang / sa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa
344b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / so so yang dag par rig po'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // 
344b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang /  ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar
344b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms che na po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / dbang
344b6(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sgra dag thos so// des sgra rnam pa de lta bu thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob po/ dben pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang
344b7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang ldan pa dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa dang 'gog pa dang ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa dang / byang chub yongs su 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // kun
344b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na mi dge ba'i ming med do// sgrib pa'i sgra yod med do// ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra yang yong med do// sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang yong medo// 
345a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de ni sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i sgra yang me na/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra ltag la yod
345a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par byed na/ skal ba'am skal pa las
345a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag par zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der sems
345a4(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyurab de dag thams cad kyang gzugs dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / chu zheng dang / dbang
345a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / mngon par shes bdag dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bskyedamos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa
345a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya yongs su spyad pa de lta bu dag dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su
345a7(dkon brtsegs): sprad pa rnam pa de lta bu thams cad dang ldan te/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems can dag khams kyi zas
345a8(dkon brtsegs): zo ba rags pa'i kha zas mi za'o// kha zas rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'byor pa nyid du shes te/ lus tshim par 'gyur/ lus gzugs tshim par 'gyur ro zhes de dag yang
345b1(dkon brtsegs): lus la 'jug par mi byed do// de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i lha'i spos kyi rnam pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bdugs par 'gyur ro// de na
345b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dri de la snom par mi 'dod pa de la spos dri'i 'du shes dang / bsgos pa tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar gang dag spros dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang // 
345b3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag gi rnam pa ji lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par
345b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de dag gos kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog da brgya stong du ma ci 'dra ba 'dod pa de lta bu'i gos rin po che/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab
345b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing lus la bgos par bdag nyid kyis shesaso// de dag 'di lta ste/ mgo bo'i rgyan nam/ rna ba'i rgyan nam/ mgul pa dang / lag pa dang / 
345b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste cod pan dang / rna cha dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gser gyi tsing tseng
345b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ske rags dang / gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che
345b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du mas spras pa 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa la 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang bar mthong ste/ rgyan de dag gis bdag brgyan par yang shes so// de dag gang kha
346a1(dkon brtsegs): dog dang / rtags dang // dbyibs dang / chu zheng gi bar dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba gam brgya stong gis brgyan pa rin po che'i khri lha'i ras
346a2(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba sngas khra bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang de dag de dag gi mdun du 'byung ste/ de dag rin po che'i gzhal
346a3(dkon brtsegs): med khang grub pa de dag gi nang na lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gis yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas 'khod de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang
346a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams tha dad pa med de/ gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tha daskad kyis lha dang mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni ma gto gas so// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los
346a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na mi ma rabs dang / mi za ma ni lam me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin zhing mi 'jigs pa ma yin la 'od gsal ba ma yin no// 
346a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / dbang dang
346a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phral dang / cho 'phrul dang / dbang phyug gis lam me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma
346a8(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so// kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams
346b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can de na snga dro'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe phyogs pa ni kun nas 'khrug shing kun du 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste de dag gis rin po che'i shing ljon pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa kha dog tha dad pa kha dog du ma yod/ 
346b2(dkon brtsegs): palha'i spos dri rab tu nim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa de dag bskyod kun du bskyod/ bskul kun du bsgral nas de dag las me tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsung can blta na sdug pa dag rin po
346b3(dkon brtsegs): che'i sa chen po de la 'phrul te/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du mi 'greng ba bdun srid du bkram par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu sa la me tog 'gems mkhas pa
346b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis lag pa gnyis kas bkram ste/ mnyam parabakod na shin du bkra ning bltan sdug go/ de bzhin du me tog bsung dang kha dag tha dad pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi/ 
346b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing de kun du mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro// me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste/ dpe tsam dun gos katsa la na da ltar reg na bde ba'o// de dag na rkang pa
346b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing rkang pa 'degs pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro// snga dro'i dris 'das nas me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med par 'gyur te/ de'i
346b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi ning bde ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / dag par 'gyur zhing me tog snga ma rnams kyis brnyogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyogs pa ni kun nas rlung langs/ 
346b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ gang sngon ma byung ba'i me tog sa rapa dag mngon par 'thor ro// snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang / phyi dro'i dris kyi tshe dang / mtshan mo yang srong dang nam gyi gung dang tho rangs kyang de bzhin
347a1(dkon brtsegs): no// spos dang / dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rlung de dag langs nas sems can de dag la reg na 'di lta ste dper na dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta
347a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par me dang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang
347a3(dkon brtsegs): skar ma'i gzugs dang / mun pa mun nag gi ming du gdags pa yong med do// nyin mo dang mtshan mor gdags pa yang yong med de khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong med do// kun
347a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can den dus dus su lcesmos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i me tig kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang / lha'i rini
347a5(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phyem dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyi cheramangon par 'bab bo// lha'i bla re dag kyang 'dzin to// 
347a6(dkon brtsegs): lho'i rin po che'i gdugs rnga ma'o bsil yab dang / bcas pa dag kyang na mkha' la 'dzin to// lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang sgrogs shing lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do// kun
347a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
347a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir na na/ dan 'di lta ste mnges pa dang / log pa nyid dunges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par bzhag pa'am gdags pa med par phyir ro// kun dga' bo mder bsnun rnam grangs 'dis 'dzig
347b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de bde can zhes byaste rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par bstan na ni skal ba zang zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yong su brjod kyang bde bar
347b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la/ 
347b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste// de dag skal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // bsngags pa'i phreng ba rab tu brjod pa na// skal pa bye ba de
347b4(dkon brtsegs): dag zang 'gyur gyi// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mtharami phyin// de dag spobs pa'ang zad par 'gyur ma yin/ 8/ gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig/ 
347b5(dkon brtsegs): cing btags te rdul du byas gyur pa// de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang / ste sbyin pa byin pa ni// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'od
347b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang // bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags rnams// thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di yi tshor yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bas na de bzhin
347b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i// yon tan thos nas mgu dang dang skyes la// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po bskyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi
347b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi// ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni// zhing mchog thag gru chen po de dag kun// cha dang dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab
348a1(dkon brtsegs): can// de dag de bas bsod nams mang du 'gyur// don dam thob phyir dang partsa bste// de lta bas na thos nas yid gnyis gsol// kun dga'
348a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan
348a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod do// bsngags pa gsung ngo // grags pa rab
348a4(dkon brtsegs): tu sgrogs so// yon tan brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da sems can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la thos nas kyang than sems bskyed
348a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa zag pa nas dang ba dang ldan pas bskyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// 
348a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo sems can gang dag kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems
348a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
348a8(dkon brtsegs): dpag med de dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'di dpag med de mthong nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis
348b1(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong
348b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par
348b3(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yid la byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du bskyed
348b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtong bde dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
348b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zhing dang zhab 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur
348b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / brjed pa med pa'i dran pas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga'/ 
348b7(dkon brtsegs): bo sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag 'chad pa na dga' ba 'thob cing
348b8(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug pa med la mi 'gong mi num zhing tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yid la byed de 'dod pa yang bskyed na de dag rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
349a1(dkon brtsegs): de mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// 
349a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang
349a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod do// bsngags pa yang gsung / bstod pa yang sgrogs so// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag de
349a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyagabya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su di ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang
349a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum chogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ 'dong ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid
349a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gsung zhing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing // mtha' yas gang+gA'i
349a7(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa// dri nam yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lgang
349a8(dkon brtsegs): mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang // byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams
349b1(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyam thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod
349b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis// mchod pa byas te dpag med 'od zhabs la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du
349b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes shes 'dzer// dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems ni gzhal yas kyis// de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor nas// 'dren pa de yi spyan sngar 'di skad du/ 
349b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur zhes smras// de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag/ de tshe dpag tshad brgya pa'i da gdugs gyur te// legs por brgyan zhing yu bi bkra
349b5(dkon brtsegs): bas mdzes// sangs rgyas sku la kun du khebs par gan sa// byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du/ bsnyen bkur byas nas dga' ste 'di skad du// gang dag gis
349b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs rnyed 'dzer// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na// bdog cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed/ 
349b7(dkon brtsegs): skal pa stong du ston pas gang bsgrubs pa// rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni ci 'dra ltos// 'od ni dpag med gzi brjid dpag med pa// sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun dpag med pa// byang chub
349b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas bskor zhing mdzes gyur pa// sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po mchog la ltos// de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas// 'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug
350a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag nal gyi dkyil 'khor nas byung ste// zhing stong bye ba dag ni khyab par mdzad// 'od 'phro de dag thams cad slar log ste// 'dren pa'i spyi gtsug
350a2(dkon brtsegs): der ni nub par gyur// de tshe 'od 'phro nub par gyur nas ni// lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu bskyed// de nas sangs rgyas sras po grags chen po// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de
350a3(dkon brtsegs): langs te// gang slad 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum mdzad pa// bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags// sems can mang 'gro la phan pa thugs brtse can// don dam mkhas pa de ni lung
350a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol// gsung mchog yid du mchi ba de thos nas// sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang byang chub sems dpa' dag
350a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas blta slad bde can 'dir mchi ba// de dag tho sa nas dga' ba cher bskyed de// myur du zhing 'di rna ma par blta bar 'gyur// rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags par
350a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas kyang // lha yi mig dang lha yi rna ba dang // tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis
350a7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa// ngas ni sngon tshe smon lam 'di skad btab// sems can gang gis nga yi ming thos na// nga yi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog/ nga yi smon lam bzang po de rdzogs pas// 'jig
350a8(dkon brtsegs): rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'ong // de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog/ de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir// bdag gi
350b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang 'dir 'drar gyur pa dang // bdag gi ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang // sems can mang po grol bar bya 'dod pa// de ni myur du rings par la gor du// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
350b2(dkon brtsegs): khams song la// 'od dpag med kyi gan du song nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod pagyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi zhing mang song nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba mngal mchod bya ste// 
350b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang // dro khar bde ba can du slar yang 'ong // / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// 
350b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ dpar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'phang du dpag tshad stong drug brgya yod pa/ yal ga dang / 
350b5(dkon brtsegs): lo ma dang / 'dab ma dpag tshad brgyad brgya tshun chad du/ 'phyang ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ rtag tu lo ma chags pa/ rtag tu me tog
350b6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lo ma tha dad pa/ me tog tha dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches rnam par spras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin
350b8(dkon brtsegs): po che mchog gis shin du rnam par smras pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa/ gser gyi skud pa 'chang ba/ sa mo do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan phreng dang / do
351a1(dkon brtsegs): shal tshig rkyang dang / mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig sngon po'i rgyan phreng dang / seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs
351a2(dkon brtsegs): yod pa/ rin po che'i tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin po che thams cad dang / dung gi mngon par spras pa/ gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dri ba dang / rin po che thams
351a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bla rer bres pa/ chu srin dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / zla gam lta bur legs par brgyan pa/ nor bu
351a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrol ba dang / gser dang rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun
351a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub kyi shing de rlung gis bskyod na sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing
351a6(dkon brtsegs): gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du rna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs
351a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med gzhal du med tshad med brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga'
351a8(dkon brtsegs): bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can gang dag byang chub
351b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la
351b2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos nyid du nges par
351b3(dkon brtsegs): sems pa de dag kyang de nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yeng bar shes par bya'o// sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu blan
351b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag me dad de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / 
351b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa shin du rdzogs pa dang / shin du bsgoms pa dang / mi nyung ba dang ma tshang ba med pas/ 'di/ 
351b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste sgra'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rje su 'thun pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob po// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi
351b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing der skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
351b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur to// smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa go cha rgya chen po bgos pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su
352a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las bzla ba la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang ba sha
352a2(dkon brtsegs): stag go// byang chub sems dpa' gang dga' khod pa de dag ni 'od dpag med bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
352a3(dkon brtsegs): khor yug du snang bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
352a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyi ming ci zhes bgyi/ bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo de gnyis la gcig ni ming ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
352a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// gci ga gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas
352a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der skyes so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus yongs su
352a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ dbang po rno ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ 
352a8(dkon brtsegs): mazhum pa/ dbang po mi g.yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yas pa mu med pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams
352b1(dkon brtsegs): cad ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar gzung nas nam yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi
352b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ gang dag dper na da ltar gyi bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skal
352b3(dkon brtsegs): pas dkrugs pa dag tu gnas par sngon smon lam btab pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro cog bzhin
352b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu dong nas sangs rgyas bye ba/ khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de/  de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
352b5(dkon brtsegs): mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / 
352b6(dkon brtsegs): gla dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod par bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems bskyed cing ji snyed 'dod pa rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i
352b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog nas rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed la/ dge ba'i
352b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mang po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang bskyed cing sogs so// gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu lag pa nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na yang de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag
353a1(dkon brtsegs): tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa dri ba dad pa/ dri dum yod pa'i skyon du dag lag pa nas 'byung ste/ de dag gis sgron bu me tog rnam pa de lta bu da/ 
353a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de gal mthor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ro// skon du'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las nang gi chung ngu gang yin pa de yang steng gi bar
353a3(dkon brtsegs): snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdug su 'gyur te/ phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar snga mas la mi ltung ngo // den skon bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la
353a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba yang yod/ dpag tshad sum cu dang bzhi bcun tshad tsam yang yod steng gi bar snang la me tog
353a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// don gang dgadaga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed cing
353a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dga' ba chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la slar log/ 
353a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi brlabs kyis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon
353a8(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa byin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam 'byor zhing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / shin du rnam par
353b1(dkon brtsegs): phye ba dang shin du bsgos pas smon lam bdab pa 'grub po// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ning der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad na thams cad
353b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' yang mi bskyed do// de dag thams cad
353b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba mi skyed do// 'gro ba na yang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i ltos pa dang bcas par ni ma yin no// 
353b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang gnas kyi sems dang sems de lta bu dag dadag la yong med do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems
353b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyesapa de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi 'du shes maud/ 'thab
353b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ rtsod pa med/ mi mthun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang
353b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / rab tu dang ba'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang
353b8(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i sems dang / sems
354a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la blo rab tu zhugs pa shes rab rgya mtsho chen po dang mnyam pa/ blo ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan du ma bsags
354a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag yang dag par 'gro bas rnam par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ lha'i mig mngon par
354a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa/ chos kyi mig gi pha rol du son pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrub cing 'chad de ston la/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
354a4(dkon brtsegs): cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pakhams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa sems dul ba/ sems zhi ba chos thams cad
354a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa/ kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa chos kyi nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la mkhas pa tshul dang tshul
354a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lta bar gnas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnams kyi snying po rtogs pa/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba
354a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ci yang med pa len pa med pa sems pa med pa
354a8(dkon brtsegs): phung po med pa/ len pa med pas shin du rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa rtsa ba med pa la gnas pa
354b1(dkon brtsegs): / sems chags pa med pa zhum pa med pa chos zab mo rnams la mngon par brtson pa/ sgyid lug pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas/ 'phags
354b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam rjes su thob pa the tshom med ba dogs pa las brgal ba shes pa gzhan gyi drang la mi 'jog par lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ri rab dang mtshungs pa 'khrugs pa med pa'i blos rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba shes rab kyi 'od dang dkar zhing shin du dkar la dag cing dge ba'i sems dang gser bco ma'i kha dog
354b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar snang zhing 'od 'thung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gis nyi zla/ de'i 'od las shin du 'das pa sems can thams cad kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba bzod
354b5(dkon brtsegs): pas sa dang mtshungs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri mi 'khru bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba chos thams cad la rlom sems su byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsreg pa'i phyir
354b6(dkon brtsegs): me'i phung po dang mtshungs pa / 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad nges par 'bigs pa dang thams cad du ci yang med pa'i phyir na mkha' dang mtshungs
354b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i phyir pad+ma dang 'dra ba/ chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par sgrogs pas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'brug chen po dang mtshungs pa/ 
354b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi chu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa sems shin tu mchog tu dul bas
355a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che chen po dang 'dra ba shin du dul bas rta cang shes bzang po dang mtshungs pa rtsal dang mi 'jigs pas skrag pa
355a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra bsems can thams cad yongs su skyob pas shing gi rgyal po n+ya gong dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g.yas
355a3(dkon brtsegs): pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra ba/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas na mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po
355a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba gnas su sogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs dpa phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pas bya 'i rgyal po na mkha' lding dang 'dra ba
355a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dka' ba'i phyir u dum 'ba' ra'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ rgya mtsho ltar shin du mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa/ dbang po rmugs pa
355a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba/ pha rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas phrag dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la
355a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pa chos yongs su tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba tshul khrims kyi bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra ba/ thos pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa
355a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sgra snyan pa chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba/ chos kyi dung chen po 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba/ chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzin pa/ 
355b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar byed pa shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba rmongs pa med pa zhe sdang med pa thab btul ba dag pa dri nga ba med pa
355b2(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par 'ged pa la dga' ba gtong ba btang ba sbyin pa lag brkyang ba chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'ged pa la dga' ba sbyin pa
355b3(dkon brtsegs): la ser sna med pa/ 'dres pa med pa yid 'jigs pa med pa/ chags pa med pa/ brtan pa/ dpa' ba/ gces par 'dzin pa/ mos pa dang ldan po
355b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa/ zug rngu phyung ba gtan pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa nges pa 'grogs na bde ba/ don byed pa 'jig rten gsal
355b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ 'dren pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa dang / dag pa mya ngan dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma gsum
355b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa mngon par shes pas rnam par brtson pa rgyu'i stobs can smon lam gyi stobs can mi dman pa gya gyu med pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i
355b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed pa nga rgyal gyi zug rngu bton pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba dag pa dge ba la mos pa rgyal ba dam pas bsngags pas 'jig rten
355b8(dkon brtsegs): na mkhas pa/ sbyangs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa rgyal bas bstod pa sems dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rtul phod pa/ sran thub pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ za ba
356a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa 'dus pa rgya che ba khyu mchog tu gyur pa bden pa smrab blo dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / 
356a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa rtog pa dang ldan pa shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can bsod nams dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ thab dang dri ma dang / khong khrob
356a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos thams cad la thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa'
356a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'di lta bu sha stag ste/ rgyas par byas na// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad skal pa bye ba khra/ dag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas bstan kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag
356a5(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan par mi nus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste byang chub sems
356a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis ka yang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga'
356a7(dkon brtsegs): bo longs la nub phyogs su phyogs te/ me tog gtor la thal mo sbyar te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
356a8(dkon brtsegs): med rdul med cing rnam par dag pa bzhugs shing 'tshol ba zhes shing chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag 'tshol cig/ de'i mtshan de yang sgrib pa med par phyogs bcur grags te/ 
356b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs re re na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung chags pa mi mnga' zhing gsung thogs pa mi mnga' ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lan 'ga' lan 'ga' ma yin par bsngags pa brjod cing / 
356b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod de snyan pa gsung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
356b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med tshe dpag med de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya
356b4(dkon brtsegs): stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta 'tsha'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
356b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyagagi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ngo // 
356b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong thams cad na ri nag po 'am/ rin po che'i ri'am/ lhun po 'am/ lhun po chen po 'am/ btang bzung ngam/ btang bzung chen
356b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ khor yug gam khor yug chen po 'am/ rtsig pa 'am ka ba'am/ shing ljon pa stug po'am bskyed mos tshal lam/ gzhal med khang ngam/ 
356b8(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis thal bar 'gyur zhing zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma shar
357a1(dkon brtsegs): nam minag mdom ga cam na 'dug pa la ma nig bsgru ba de bzhin du/ ra che 'an/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / 'od
357a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa phyir dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mang ga ding wA dang / kludang / gnad d+hin dang / dri ba dang / 
357a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan da/ rnam kha stong dang / mi'am chingang / ljo phye chen po dang / mi dpa ma ma yin padag sangs rgyas kyi ni dinas/ de bzhini gshegs pa dag bcan pa yang dag par rdzags
357a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal po rang ltar sangs rgyas kyi shing thaMd nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam me ldan ne lhang nger mdzes pa
357a5(dkon brtsegs): de dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen po dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun de la po lta'o//  lta ste dper nas chen po 'di chu gcig tu gyur na/ 
357a6(dkon brtsegs): del shing ldan pa rnams med/ ri rnams med/ gling rnams med/ rtswa dang shing gil ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams med/ tshwa klung rnams med cing
357a7(dkon brtsegs): ngam grog dang / g.yangs rnams mi snang ste/ gnan du nas chen po rgya mchog cig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon
357a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub pa'i 'di 'dom gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi 'od dpag chad bye ba brgya stong yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtags sam/ mtshan ma nung zad kyang med do// 
357b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan
357b2(dkon brtsegs): nas phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun du snang ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
357b3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi de dag thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor zhing chos ston pa yang
357b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa la bka' stsal dpa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon
357b5(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / steng gi bar snang la kun dga'i ra ba nyams dga' ba dag dang nags tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / bskyed
357b6(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / chu klung dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag dang / rin po che'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang bdag dang
357b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi na mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang / me tog gi phreng bas kun du mdzes par byas pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
357b8(dkon brtsegs): ka ba'i phreng gis gang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshog kyi bsten pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
358a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad sgras go bar byed cing des
358a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / mi 'bral bar gyur pa dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan
358a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa dag tu bzhugs te/ bar snang la chags
358a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gro ba dag mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du
358a5(dkon brtsegs): sems gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnam/ sa tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ gsol ba
358a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du lags so// 
358a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa
358a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa 'am/ dpag tshad brgya pa 'am
358b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mangs
358b2(dkon brtsegs): na gnas par mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das ngan sems can brdzus te 'byung ba gang dag pad+ma rnams la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na bcom ldan 'das
358b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig pad+ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang kha cig pad+ma la dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas brdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyu ni gang legs/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
358b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te the tshom du lhung ba'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
358b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so// gang dag the chom med cing som nyi med de 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
358b6(dkon brtsegs): can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing dad la mos pa de dag ni pad+ma rnams
358b7(dkon brtsegs): la dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas brdzus te 'byung ngo // mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag
358b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar sems bskyed cing the tshom mi bskyed la/ sangs
359a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la som nyi med cing rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang sogs pa de dag ni dkyil mo dkang bcas nas brdzus te 'byung bar
359a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas ring po ma lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// mi pham pa shes rab kyi khyad par dang / 
359a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi rim pa dang / 'di lta ste the tshom du lhung ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams shing / byang chub sems dpa'
359a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / chos kyi ga tam dang / dge ba'i spyod pa dang / dge ba phun ra sum tshogs pa thams cad las yong su nyams pa'i shes
359a5(dkon brtsegs): rab yongs su nyams pa dang shes rab chung ba la ltos mi pham pa 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal ri gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la khri mon gser dang
359a6(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya thams cad kyis spras pa dar dang / phreng ba dang / lnga ldi'i tshogs dpyangs pa/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bla ro bris pa/ ras bcos bu bting ba me
359a7(dkon brtsegs): tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ bdug pa rgya chen pos bdugs pa/ khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / skar khung dang / kha khyer dang / rta babs dang / 
359a8(dkon brtsegs): ba gam rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gser dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bres pa/ gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ 
359b1(dkon brtsegs): thim skas bzhi bcas pa zhig yod la rgyal po de'i bu nyes pa zhig gi phyir khri mon der bcug ste 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi khong sgril du bcug la der de'i khri ba sham
359b2(dkon brtsegs): te stan ko na ka bting la bar tshangs can dang ba la la ki bting ste/ yul ka ling ka'i ras kyis bding ba bting la/ de'i steng du dar bting ste/ g.yas g.yon
359b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su rten ma dmar po bzhag pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa de la de 'dug kyang rung nyal yang rung de'i zas skom gtsang ma bsod pa rnam pa mang po du ma bshams na/ 
359b4(dkon brtsegs): mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems rgyal po'i bu de yongs su spyad pa rgya che ba yin nam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya che lags so// bcom ldan
359b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ des de'i ro myang bar byed dam/ mid par byed dam/ des dga' ba 'thob bam
359b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ nongs pa gang gi slad du rgyal pos khri mon der stsal pa/ de las thar bar 'tshal zhing rigs bzang po rigs bzang
359b7(dkon brtsegs): bo'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / khams kyi rgyal po 'am gang gis khri mon de las
359b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba yongs su tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de btson ra de ni dga' ba ma mchis shing rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du mi thar ro// bcom ldan
360a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tsom du lhung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas kyi
360a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos po de dang / sems dang btsam des 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skye yang pad+ma
360a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing brdzus te 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ pad+ma rnams kyi mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang du 'du shes
360a4(dkon brtsegs): shing gnas te/ bshang gci med/ 'chil ma dang / snabs med/ yid dang mi mthun pa mi 'byung mod kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 
360a5(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam rnam par nges pa dang // dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba yin
360a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag pad+ma'i mngal nas 'byung ste/ de dag de nas 'byung yang steng ngam/ 'og gam
360a7(dkon brtsegs): thad kar byung ba mi shes so// mi pham pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po grangs med tshad med dpag tu
360a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tshom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrubs par ma gyur pa la ltos/ mi pham pa tha
360b1(dkon brtsegs): chom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos mi pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tshom yongs su spangs te/ byang chub
360b2(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
360b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'
360b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpada' mi pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang chub sems dpa'
360b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan nas ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ 
360b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
360b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na dge ba'i rtsa bde bas chung ngu rnams lta smos kyang
360b8(dkon brtsegs): dgos de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
361a1(dkon brtsegs): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'thung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gnanas
361a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gnanas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
361a3(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten
361a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi sgron ma'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
361a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa klu zil gyis gnon pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
361a6(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'od kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
361a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas
361a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas byang chub sems
361b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' khri
361b2(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal mtshan gyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa 'jug
361b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil pa bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
361b4(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
361b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnye/ sa pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / 
361b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang yongs su dab dang yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
361b7(dkon brtsegs): maumi pham pa rnam grangs de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / 
361b8(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan skal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// 
362a1(dkon brtsegs): mi pham pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od pag me cwa mtshan thos pa'i sems can dang / 
362a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ji skad cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la tha na sems dad pa gcig tsam rnyed pa dang chos
362a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di las dad pa mi phyed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro// mi pham pade lta bas na khyod mos par byas/ khyod kyi khong du chud bar
362a4(dkon brtsegs): byastelha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang btsos padod/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang btsas pa
362a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog rten gyi mdun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang kun chub par byabadang gzhan dag la yang rgya
362a6(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// mi pham pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid zhag gcig tsam yang gzung zhing
362a7(dkon brtsegs): bcangs te klags shing kun chub par byas la bsam pa thag pa na gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// tha na glags bam la legs par bris te bcang bar
362a8(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o// gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la
362b1(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ched pag med del ltu ba dang bdag nyid nga sangs rgyas kyi dang gson tan gyi rgyan bkod pa zu sa mtshan/ 
362b2(dkon brtsegs): bakhyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pades chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las brgal hU~M
362b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang g.yor ma lhung ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su dga' bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / 
362b4(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir brtso/ na 'grus rlabs po che chen po brtsam par bya'o// 
362b5(dkon brtsegs): tha na pa gcig 'jos pa de srid du yang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po garten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba de brgal nas kyang
362b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi pham pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag chos kyi rnam grangs
362b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di nyan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig
362b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag por bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas
363a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis gnang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur du bsgrub pa 'di gang dag gi rnalam du grag par
363a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag ni rnyed pa shin tu legs pa rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang sngon gyi rgyal bal lhag par bya ba byas pa rje/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs
363a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang dga' bang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog
363a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang bsgom pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / tha na yi ge
363a5(dkon brtsegs): bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed/ par 'gyur te/ de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin/ no// mi pham pa de ltar nangs de bzhin gshegs
363a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa yin te/ khyod kyang ngathe tshom med par brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la som nyi ma za cig
363a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i brtson rar chud da re mi pham pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// chos bstan pa rnyed par dka'o// dal ba
363a8(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o// mi pham pa ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis da khyod kyis mngon par sbyor la bsgrubs shig/ mi pham pa
363b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang chung mi za bar bya ba'i phyir mongs su gtad pa chen pobya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya bar phyir brtson par gyis shig de bzhin gshegs pa
363b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar gyur tar
363b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa// 'di 'dra 'di dag thos mi 'gyur// dpa' bo gang dag don
363b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa// de dag gsung 'di zos par 'gyur// gang gis 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas mdzang nas ni// gus dang bcas
363b5(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thos pas// de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thod/ lta ba can dang dman dang num rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus// gang dag
363b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyad la slob// dper na skyes bu long ba mun khung na// lam yang mi shes bstan par gal nus/ 
363b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyan thos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes mi rtog sems can gzhan ci smos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen// lA klu l+le min
363b8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin nyan thos min// sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin// gal te semaso can thams cad bde bar gshegs/ 
364a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rnam dag don la mkhas gyur te// de dag skal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan brjod
364a2(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang // de dag par du mya ngan 'das gyur gyi// skal ba bye ba mang por rab brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med mi 'gyur te// de ltar rgyal ba'i yon tan
364a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar to// de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i rang bzhin mi// gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te// rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te// sangs rgyas nyid
364a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen zhes tshig tu brjod// brgya lam na ni mi yi lus rnyed la// brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'bru dang bar 'gyur// dang dang shes rab yun ring rnyed par
364a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de bas don thob pa phyir brtson 'grus bskye // gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni// bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur/ 
364a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mos bskyed pa// de dag 'das pa'i dus na nged dang shes// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos
364a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pas zag pa rnams
364a8(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu
364b1(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon sems ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang phyag bya
364b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
364b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ba bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
364b5(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa 'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
364b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
364b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang kun du snang ngo // me tog man da ra ba dag kyang sa la
364b8(dkon brtsegs): bus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// lha dang mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par gyur to// 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du yang rjes su yid rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra
